话题1-自己.chinese: 我的兴趣很广泛，包括慢跑、阅读和玩电脑游戏.
话题1-自己.english: My interests are manifold, including jogging, reading and playing computer games.
I enjoy reading books in my leisure time.

话题1-自己.chinese: 我喜欢体育运动，特别是打羽毛球.
话题1-自己.english: I'm fond of sports and especially like playing badminton.

话题1-自己.chinese: 我的业余爱好是 (通过) 爬山以保持健康并亲近自然.
话题1-自己.english: My hobby of climbing mountains keeps me fit and close to nature.

话题1-自己.chinese: 集邮教会了我很多东西.
话题1-自己.english: Collecting stamps educates me in a variety of ways.

话题1-自己.chinese: 我是一个勤奋、谦逊、热心的人.
我随时准备帮助那些需要帮助的人.
话题1-自己.english: I'm always ready to help people in need.

话题1-自己.chinese: 我深知自己的缺点，总是尽力克服它.
话题1-自己.english: Sensible of my shortcoming, I always try to overcome it.
Being timid is my greatest shortcoming.

话题1-自己.chinese: 我是一个喜欢与人交友的外向女孩.
话题1-自己.english: I'm an outgoing girl who likes to make friends with people.

话题1-自己.chinese: 由于个性随和，我能够和我认识的大多数人友好相处.
话题1-自己.english: Being easy-going, I'm able to get along well with most of the people I know.

话题1-自己.chinese: 怀着对成功的强烈决心，我在学习上取得持续 (稳定) 的进步.
话题1-自己.english: With a strong determination to succeed, I make steady progress in my studies.

话题2-家庭.chinese: 我父亲是工人阶级出身.
话题2-家庭.english: My father is from a working-class background.
My father works hard to support the family.

话题2-家庭.chinese: 我父亲是家庭的主心骨.
话题2-家庭.english: My father is the backbone of my family.

话题2-家庭.chinese: 我父母都工作，所以我家是” 双职工” 家庭.
话题2-家庭.english: My family is a two-career family with both my parents working.

话题2-家庭.chinese: 重大家庭事务的决策权在我妈妈的手中.
话题2-家庭.english: The decision power of family affairs is in the hand of my mother.

话题2-家庭.chinese: 在家庭事务中我没有发言权.
话题2-家庭.english: I have no say in family affairs.
My mother queens it over the whole family.

话题2-家庭.chinese: 我们每月举行一次家庭聚会.
话题2-家庭.english: We have a family gathering every month.

话题2-家庭.chinese: 父母是孩子最早的老师.
话题2-家庭.english: Children learn their first lesson from their parents.

话题2-家庭.chinese: 每当我感到挫折或伤心时，我就会回家寻求安慰.
话题2-家庭.english: Whenever I feel frustrated or sad, I turn to my family for comfort.

话题2-家庭.chinese: 和谐的家庭对孩子的成长很重要.
话题2-家庭.english: A harmonious family is important for the growth of children.

话题2-家庭.chinese: 家庭是社会的基本组成部分.
话题2-家庭.english: Family is the basic unit of society.

话题3-朋友.english: I treasure the friendship of a friend in need.

话题3-朋友.chinese: 真正的朋友是在你需要肩膀依靠的时候，他总在你身边.
话题3-朋友.english: A true friend will always be there when you need a shoulder to lean on.

话题3-朋友.chinese: 获得朋友的唯一方法是要先成为别人的朋友.
话题3-朋友.english: The only way to have a friend is to be one.

话题3-朋友.chinese: 对我来说，友情是世界上最珍贵的财富之一.
话题3-朋友.english: For me, friendship is one of the most valuable possessions in the world.

话题3-朋友.chinese: 中国传统认为，士为知己者死./(真正的绅士能够为朋友去死).
话题3-朋友.english: The traditional Chinese believe that a gentleman should be able to die for his friends.

话题3-朋友.chinese: 建立友谊需要双方的努力.
话题3-朋友.english: To build up friendship needs the efforts on both sides.

话题3-朋友.chinese: 人们通常和有相似兴趣的人交朋友.
话题3-朋友.english: People like to make friends with those who have similar interests.

话题3-朋友.chinese: 向朋友倾诉烦恼是减轻压力的一个好方式.
话题3-朋友.english: Pouring out troubles to friends is a good way of easing off pressure.

话题3-朋友.chinese: 真正的朋友不会在你有困难的时候袖手旁观.
话题3-朋友.english: A true friend will not stand by when you are in trouble.
In friendship, loyalty may be the most important thing.

话题3-朋友.chinese: 友情就像家庭一样给人带来舒适.
话题3-朋友.english: Friendship is a comfy situation like home.

话题3-朋友.chinese: 友谊是包含信任、支持、沟通、忠诚和理解的深层 (内部) 关系.
话题3-朋友.english: Friendship is an inner relationship combining trust, support, communication, loyalty and understanding.

话题4-同学.chinese: 我经常向她倾诉我的苦恼.
话题4-同学.english: I always pour my troubles to her.

话题4-同学.chinese: 她既温柔体贴又善解人意，对我们来说像姐姐一样.
话题4-同学.english: Being tender and understanding, she is like a sister to us.

话题4-同学.chinese: 我们共度了许多值得记忆的美好时光.
话题4-同学.english: We have much memorable time together.

话题4-同学.chinese: 我们共同分担痛苦、分享喜悦.
话题4-同学.english: We share our sorrow and happiness together.
We are birds of a feather.
Our friendship is built upon a solid base.
I know her inside and out.

话题4-同学.chinese: 亲密的朋友就是你能将所有秘密告诉他的人.
话题4-同学.english: A bosom friend is one to whom you could tell all your secrets.

话题4-同学.chinese: 她的个性与我的完全一样.
话题4-同学.english: Her personality is exactly the same as mine.

话题4-同学.chinese: 他和我们班上每个人都相处得很好.
话题4-同学.english: He gets along well with everyone in our class.

话题4-同学.chinese: 从幼儿园开始，我们就互相认识.
话题4-同学.english: We have known each other since we were in kindergarten.

话题5-孩子.chinese: 她是个被宠坏了的孩子.
现在的孩子面临 (在…… 之下) 更多的竞争压力.
话题5-孩子.english: Nowadays children are under more pressure of competition.

话题5-孩子.chinese: 今天的孩子享受更高水平的物质生活.
话题5-孩子.english: Today's children enjoy a higher level of material life.

话题5-孩子.chinese: 我的侄女是个有着明亮眼睛和一双小脚的可爱孩子.
话题5-孩子.english: My niece is a lovely child with shiny eyes and tiny feet.

话题5-孩子.chinese: 她是如此可爱，以致我真想亲一下她灿烂的笑脸.
话题5-孩子.english: She is so adorable that I want to kiss her flowery face.

话题5-孩子.chinese: 他是家里的” 小皇帝”.
话题5-孩子.english: He is a little emperor of the family.

话题5-孩子.chinese: 我们应当培养孩子的动手 (操作) 能力.
话题5-孩子.english: We should train children's practical skills.

话题5-孩子.chinese: 在” 双职工” 家庭，孩子经常被忽略.
话题5-孩子.english: In double-career families children are often neglected.

话题5-孩子.chinese: 彼得一家住在我家楼上.
话题5-孩子.english: Peter and his family live in the flat above mine.

话题5-孩子.chinese: 就 (他的) 年龄而言，他是个高个子.
话题5-孩子.english: He is tall for his age.

话题5-孩子.chinese: 我侄子高兴的时候，总是面帶非常温馨的笑容.
话题5-孩子.english: My nephew wears a very warm smile on his face when he is happy.

话题5-孩子.chinese: 他意志坚定，常常想方设法得到他想要的东西.
话题5-孩子.english: He is strong-willed and usually finds out ways to get what he wants.

话题6-同事.chinese: 他时常炫耀他 (取得) 的成就.
话题6-同事.english: He always brags about his achievements.

话题6-同事.chinese: 他如此粗心以致无人愿意和他共事.
话题6-同事.english: He is so careless that no one wants to work with him.

话题6-同事.chinese: 你不应该在背后说同事的坏话.
话题6-同事.english: You should not say bad words about your colleagues behind their back.

话题6-同事.chinese: 相互尊重在和别人建立关系过程中至关重要.
话题6-同事.english: Mutual respect is vital in establishing relationship with others.

话题6-同事.chinese: 同事之间的关系较同学关系复杂得多.
话题6-同事.english: The relationship among colleagues is more complicated than the campus relationship.
He is the soul of the team.

话题6-同事.chinese: 有能力的同事有时对你是一种威胁.
话题6-同事.english: A competent colleague sometimes poses threat to you.

话题6-同事.chinese: 我们办公室的同事亲如一家.
话题6-同事.english: The members of our office get along like a family.

话题6-同事.chinese: 看上去他比 (实际年龄) 年轻，但是他非常内行.
话题6-同事.english: He is younger than his age, but he is quite professional.

话题6-同事.chinese: 我的同事托德真的是个好朋友，他随时都准备帮助我.
话题6-同事.english: My colleague Todd is much of a friend and he is ready to help me any time.

话题6-同事.chinese: 好的同事应该是有效率且有合作精神的.
话题6-同事.english: A good colleague is supposed to be efficient and cooperative.

话题6-同事.chinese: 在同一个项目工作是团队精神的最好锻炼.
话题6-同事.english: Working in a project is a good practice of team spirit.

话题7-名人.chinese: 周恩来总理是我最崇拜的人.
话题7-名人.english: Premier Zhou Enlai is the person I admire most.

话题7-名人.chinese: 当下，许多年轻人把电视明星当作是他们的榜样.
话题7-名人.english: Nowadays many young people consider TV stars as their role models.

话题7-名人.chinese: 这个青年女演员仅凭一部电影就获得了国际声誉.
话题7-名人.english: The young actress achieves international fame with only one movie.

话题7-名人.chinese: 窥视他人的隐私，即使他们不是名人，都是不道德的行为.
话题7-名人.english: It is immoral to probe into other people's privacy even if they are not famous.

话题7-名人.chinese: 我们应当在学习明星们的优点 (闪光点) 的同时，谨慎对待他们的缺点.
话题7-名人.english: We should learn from the shining points of the stars while being cautious against their shortcomings.

话题7-名人.chinese: 我佩服毛主席为中国人民做的一切.
话题7-名人.english: I admire Chairman Mao for what he has done for the chinese people.
He is not only successful in the IT field, but also active in the charity drive.

话题7-名人.chinese: 李开复写的《做最好的自己》一书在青年人中很受欢迎.
话题7-名人.english: Kaifu Lee has written a book named Be The Best Yourself, which is popular among young people.

话题7-名人.chinese: 他是我学习和生活中的偶像.
话题7-名人.english: He is my idol both in my study and life.

话题7-名人.chinese: 我喜欢这个歌手的歌曲，特别是 (这些歌曲的) 歌词.
话题7-名人.english: I like the songs of this singer, particularly their lyrics.

话题7-名人.chinese: 每一个人在成功之前都要经历很多失败.
话题7-名人.english: Every successful man must have had a lot of failures before he becomes a star.

话题8-邻居.chinese: 农村里邻居之间的关系较之城市里亲密一些.
话题8-邻居.english: The relationship between neighbours in rural area is closer than that in cities.

话题8-邻居.chinese: 我们中国人常说” 远亲不如近邻”.
话题8-邻居.english: We Chinese always say that a near neighbor is better than a distant relative.

话题8-邻居.chinese: 我的邻居经常给我们送来她做的美味食品.
话题8-邻居.english: My neighbour often brings over some delicious food she makes.

话题8-邻居.chinese: 有时房子的另一端的嘈杂声，使我们很难入睡.
话题8-邻居.english: Sometimes the noise on the other side of the house makes it difficult for us to fall asleep.

话题8-邻居.chinese: 邻里之间需要更多的理解.
话题8-邻居.english: Neighbours need more understanding between them.

话题8-邻居.chinese: 我一直谨慎，不在夜晚发出大的噪音.
话题8-邻居.english: I am always careful not to make big noises at night.
A good neighbour is better than a brother in the next village.

话题8-邻居.chinese: 同邻居保持良好关系是很好的.
话题8-邻居.english: It's better to keep on good terms with our neighbours.

话题8-邻居.chinese: 当问题出现时，邻里之间应该加强理解.
话题8-邻居.english: When problems occur, neighbours should try to understand each other.

话题8-邻居.chinese: 好邻居应该相互帮助，相互体贴.
话题8-邻居.english: A good neighbour is supposed to be helpful and considerate.

话题8-邻居.chinese: 我几乎每天都拜访我的邻居.
话题8-邻居.english: I pay visits to my neighbours almost every day.

话题8-邻居.chinese: 当邻居需要帮助的时候，向他们伸出援手是我们的职责.
话题8-邻居.english: It is our duty to give a hand to our neighbours when they need.

话题9-老人.chinese: 敬老是中国的传统美德.
话题9-老人.english: Respecting old people is a long-standing tradition of china.

话题9-老人.chinese: 中国已经进入了老龄化社会的阶段.
话题9-老人.english: China has entered the aging society period.

话题9-老人.chinese: 老年人的举止有时就跟小孩子一样.
话题9-老人.english: Old people sometimes behave like children.

话题9-老人.chinese: 上了年纪的人丰富的生活阅历和智慧是一种财富.
话题9-老人.english: The rich life experiences and wisdom of elderly people are a treasure.

话题9-老人.chinese: 变老是一种无法避免的自然过程.
话题9-老人.english: Aging is an unavoidable natural process.

话题9-老人.chinese: 在我的家庭里，老年人是受到尊敬的.
话题9-老人.english: In my family old people are honored.

话题9-老人.chinese: 当人们变老，有时他们就会变得暴躁而又顽固.
话题9-老人.english: When people grow old, sometimes they turn to be irritable and stubborn.

话题9-老人.chinese: 许多年轻人忽视了他们赡养父母的责任.
话题9-老人.english: Many young people neglect their duties to the old ones in the family.

话题9-老人.chinese: 几代人之间的相处要求更多的包容和理解.
话题9-老人.english: Different generations shall be more understanding to each other.

话题9-老人.chinese: 在中国，老年人经常肩负起照顾婴儿的责任.
话题9-老人.english: In China old people often shoulder the responsibility of taking care of the babies.

话题9-老人.chinese: 老年人把传统传承给下一辈.
话题9-老人.english: Old people pass down tradition to the younger generation.

话题9-老人.chinese: 现在许多老年人甚至比年轻人更加思想开明.
话题9-老人.english: Many old people today are even more open-minded than the young.

话题10-老师.chinese: 老师不仅要传授知识，还要教会德行.
话题10-老师.english: A teacher should teach not only knowledge but also morals.

话题10-老师.chinese: 耐心是老师必须具备的一个重要品质.
话题10-老师.english: Patience is an important quality required of a teacher.

话题10-老师.chinese: 他非常忠诚于他的教育事业.
话题10-老师.english: He is very much devoted to the cause of education.

话题10-老师.chinese: 他几乎把我们当作他自己的孩子.
话题10-老师.english: He treats us as if we were his own children.

话题10-老师.chinese: 父母是我们的启蒙老师.
话题10-老师.english: My parents are my first teachers.

话题10-老师.chinese: 学校应该营造充满新思维的氛围以吸引更多的好老师.
话题10-老师.english: The school shall create a stimulating atmosphere to attract great teachers.

话题10-老师.chinese: 随着科学的发展，老师们应当提高他们的教学方法以适应现代社会的要求.
话题10-老师.english: As the science develops teachers should improve their teaching methods to satisfy the requirement of the modern society.

话题10-老师.chinese: 老师应该激发学生的创造力.
话题10-老师.english: Teacher should motivate students to be creative.

话题10-老师.chinese: 好的老师不仅仅是说教，而是应该鼓励.
话题10-老师.english: A good teacher shall encourage rather than simply preach.

话题10-老师.chinese: 老师必须学习一些关于心理学的知识.
话题10-老师.english: Teachers are required to learn something about psychology.

话题10-老师.chinese: 所有的学生应当一视同仁.
话题10-老师.english: All students should be treated equally.

话题11-领导人.chinese: 好的领导应该像马一样辛勤工作.
话题11-领导人.english: A good leader is always working hard like a horse.

话题11-领导人.chinese: 作为公司的首席执行官，他面临很大压力.
话题11-领导人.english: As the CEO of this company, he is under much pressure.

话题11-领导人.chinese: 我喜欢那些对员工友善、随和的领导.
话题11-领导人.english: I like those leaders who are friendly and easy-going among his employees.

话题11-领导人.chinese: 和员工关系密切的领导才是好领导.
话题11-领导人.english: Good leaders are close to their employees.

话题11-领导人.chinese: 制定规章制度是规范公司的最好方法.
话题11-领导人.english: Rules and regulations are the best way to standardize a company.

话题11-领导人.chinese: 既然他是领导，他就应一马当先.
话题11-领导人.english: Since he is the leader, he is supposed to take the lead.

话题11-领导人.chinese: 如果我是领导，我会公平对待我的员工.
话题11-领导人.english: If I were a leader, I would be on equal terms with my employees.

话题11-领导人.chinese: 内行的领导随时准备着迎接挑战和冒险.
话题11-领导人.english: A professional leader is always ready to take challenges and risks.

话题11-领导人.chinese: 他负责为公司作出重要决定和进行财政预算.
话题11-领导人.english: He is responsible to make important decisions and budgets for the company.

话题11-领导人.chinese: 他是金融方面的专家，擅长理解政府的政策.
话题11-领导人.english: He is an expert on finance and good at interpreting the government policies.

话题11-领导人.chinese: 销售经理应该为潜在顾客提供服务和商品.
话题11-领导人.english: A sales manager is supposed to sell service and products to potential customers.

话题11-领导人.chinese: 她现在同时扮演着经理和母亲的角色.
话题11-领导人.english: She is playing a role of a manager and a role of a mother at the same time.

话题12-书籍.chinese: 一本好书不仅要有有趣的情节，更要有有意义的主题.
话题12-书籍.english: A good book should not only have an interesting plot, but also a significant theme.

话题12-书籍.chinese: 最近我在读一本马克 - 吐温写的书.
话题12-书籍.english: Recently I have been reading a book written by Mark Twain.

话题12-书籍.chinese: 我经常流连 (闲逛) 一些二手书店寻找有趣的旧书.
话题12-书籍.english: I often poke along in secondhand bookstores in search of interesting used books.

话题12-书籍.chinese: 我喜欢浪漫故事胜过现实小说.
话题12-书籍.english: I prefer romantic stories to realistic novels.

话题12-书籍.chinese: 现在市场上充斥着几天内粗制滥造的烂书.
话题12-书籍.english: Nowadays the market is full of slipshod books churned out in a few days.

话题12-书籍.chinese: 关于英雄题材的小说在中国很流行.
话题12-书籍.english: Novels on great heroes are popular in China.

话题12-书籍.chinese: 人们对于书籍有不同的品味.
话题12-书籍.english: People have different tastes for books.

话题12-书籍.chinese: 你可以在互联网上免费找到各种书籍.
话题12-书籍.english: You can find all kinds of books on the Internet for free.

话题12-书籍.chinese: 闲暇时我以读浪漫小说为乐.
话题12-书籍.english: I read romantic novels in my spare time for pleasure.

话题12-书籍.chinese: 我们应当抵制盗版书籍来保护作者的利益.
话题12-书籍.english: We should resist pirated books to protect the interests of the authors.

话题12-书籍.chinese: 我申请了一张读书卡，以便从学校图书馆借书.
话题12-书籍.english: In order to borrow books from the school library, I applied for a reading card.

话题13-衣服.chinese: 当我还是个小姑娘的时候，我经常穿旧衣服.
话题13-衣服.english: I always wore hand-me-downs when I was a little girl.

话题13-衣服.chinese: 我喜欢穿宽大的裤子，因为穿起来舒服.
话题13-衣服.english: I like baggy pants because they are comfortable.
I do not like skintight clothes.

话题13-衣服.chinese: 我欣赏时尚杂志上的时装，但是我不会穿它们.
话题13-衣服.english: I admire the fashionable clothes on fashion magazines, but I won't wear them.

话题13-衣服.chinese: 时装秀上演示的服装并不是为了日常使用.
话题13-衣服.english: Clothes demonstrated on fashion shows are not intended for everyday use.

话题13-衣服.chinese: 不同的场合你应该穿着不同的衣服.
话题13-衣服.english: Different occasions require you to wear different clothes.

话题13-衣服.chinese: 在重要的场合你应该穿正式服装以示礼貌.
话题13-衣服.english: You should wear formal clothes on important occasions to be polite.
Young people are keen for fashion.

话题13-衣服.chinese: 现在的人较 10 年前在服装上有了更多的选择.
话题13-衣服.english: Nowadays people have more choices for clothes than ten years ago.

话题13-衣服.chinese: 中国是一个大的服装生产国和出口国.
话题13-衣服.english: China is a great manufacturer and exporter of clothes.

话题13-衣服.chinese: 棉质的衣服比合成材料做的衣服更有益于健康.
话题13-衣服.english: Clothes made of cotton are healthier than those made of synthetic materials.

话题13-衣服.chinese: 老年人在穿衣上更保守.
话题13-衣服.english: Old people are more conservative about what to wear.

话题14-计算机.chinese: 我们的生活因为电脑的出现而更加方便.
话题14-计算机.english: Our life is made more convenient because of the invention of computers.

话题14-计算机.chinese: 电脑给人们提供了不同的娱乐方式，如听音乐和看电影.
话题14-计算机.english: Computer provides people with different sorts of entertainment, such as listening to music and watching films.

话题14-计算机.chinese: 据说电脑屏幕的辐射对我们的健康有害.
话题14-计算机.english: It is said that radiation of the computer screen is harmful to our health.

话题14-计算机.chinese: 许多年轻人沉迷于上网 (网上沖浪) 而忽视了他们的学习.
话题14-计算机.english: Many young people indulge themselves in surfing on the Internet and neglect their studies.

话题14-计算机.chinese: 怀孕的妇女不能在电脑前坐过长的时间.
话题14-计算机.english: Pregnant women should not sit in front of a computer for too long.

话题14-计算机.chinese: 对我来说，电脑是学习和娱乐的一种方式.
话题14-计算机.english: For me, computer is a means of study and entertainment.

话题14-计算机.chinese: 电脑病毒能够带来许多危害.
话题14-计算机.english: Computer viruses can cause a lot of damage.

话题14-计算机.chinese: 许多年轻人沉迷于电脑游戏而忽视学习.
话题14-计算机.english: Many young people are obsessed with playing computer games and neglect their studies.
Computer can be a two-edged sword.

话题14-计算机.chinese: 电脑给人们带来方便的同时也帶来问题.
话题14-计算机.english: Computer is a problem while it brings convenience to people.

话题14-计算机.chinese: 电脑得到了社会各个阶层越来越多的关注.
话题14-计算机.english: Computer has received more and more social attention from all walks of life.

话题15-烹饪与食物.chinese: 中国是有着辉煌饮食文化的国家.
话题15-烹饪与食物.english: China is a country with a splendid catering culture.

话题15-烹饪与食物.chinese: 中国有 8 (个主要) 大菜系.
话题15-烹饪与食物.english: There are eight major cuisines in China.
Sichuan dishes are spicy and hot.

话题15-烹饪与食物.chinese: 北京烤鸭是一道著名的特色菜.
话题15-烹饪与食物.english: Roast Beijing duck is a famous specialty in Beijing.

话题15-烹饪与食物.chinese: 我喜欢广东菜，因为它味道清淡.
话题15-烹饪与食物.english: I like Cantonese food because it's light in flavor.
My mother has excellent culinary skills.

话题15-烹饪与食物.chinese: 我从我妈妈那里和烹调书上学习烹调.
话题15-烹饪与食物.english: I learn cooking from my mother and cookery books.

话题15-烹饪与食物.chinese: 我经常收看电视上的烹调节目学习烹调.
话题15-烹饪与食物.english: I often watch coking programs on TV to learn cooking.

话题15-烹饪与食物.chinese: 我妈妈经常尝试做一些新菜.
话题15-烹饪与食物.english: My mother always experiments on new dishes.

话题15-烹饪与食物.chinese: 餐馆里的食物总有太多的味精.
话题15-烹饪与食物.english: Food in restaurants always has too much MSG.

话题15-烹饪与食物.chinese: 我妈妈非常注意饮食健康，做菜时放很少的味精和盐.
话题15-烹饪与食物.english: My mother is health-conscious and prepares food with little MSG and salt.

话题16-金钱.chinese: 金钱不是我追逐的对象.
话题16-金钱.english: Money is not the thing that I am after.

话题16-金钱.chinese: 我们不能成为财富的奴隶.
话题16-金钱.english: We should not let riches govern us.

话题16-金钱.chinese: 年轻人往往会花钱很随便.
话题16-金钱.english: They young people tend to be loose with their money.

话题16-金钱.chinese: 许多年轻人是拆东墙补西墙.
话题16-金钱.english: Many young people borrow from Peter to pay Paul.

话题16-金钱.chinese: 时间因其珍贵经常被比作金钱.
话题16-金钱.english: Time is often compared to money for its preciousness.

话题16-金钱.chinese: 许多低收入家庭无法达到收支平衡.
话题16-金钱.english: Many low income families can not make their ends meet.

话题16-金钱.chinese: 老年人常常在花钱上很节约.
话题16-金钱.english: Old people are often thrifty in money.
You obtain money in a right way and use it thriftily.

话题16-金钱.chinese: “有钱能使鬼推磨” 不能适用于所有场合.
话题16-金钱.english: "Money talks" could not be applied to every situation.

话题16-金钱.chinese: 节俭是中国人民的传统美德.
话题16-金钱.english: Thrifty is one of the traditional virtues of Chinese people.
Money is often where all the trouble starts.

话题16-金钱.chinese: 我们必须培养孩子对待 (处理) 金钱的能力.
话题16-金钱.english: We should cultivate children's capability of dealing with their money.

话题17-信或卡片.chinese: 现代科技在人们的联系沟通方面产生了巨大影响.
话题17-信或卡片.english: Modern science and technology brings a huge impact on people's way of communication.

话题17-信或卡片.chinese: 书信正逐渐被电子邮件所取代.
话题17-信或卡片.english: Letters are gradually giving way to e-mails.

话题17-信或卡片.chinese: 电子邮件传递速度更快，而且几乎免费.
话题17-信或卡片.english: E-mails are faster and almost cost free.

话题17-信或卡片.chinese: 传统的贺卡和书信不利于保护环境，因为它们是纸质的.
话题17-信或卡片.english: Traditional cards and letters are not environment-friendly as they are made of paper.

话题17-信或卡片.chinese: 有时候写信更加礼貌也更加正式.
话题17-信或卡片.english: Sometimes writing a letter is more polite and more formal.

话题17-信或卡片.chinese: 收到礼物后，写一封感谢信更能体现出你的细心周到.
话题17-信或卡片.english: After receiving a gift, it is thoughtful to write a thank you note.

话题17-信或卡片.chinese: 老年人往往更喜欢传统信件的感觉.
话题17-信或卡片.english: Old people tend to love the sensation of traditional letters.

话题17-信或卡片.chinese: 现在的许多年轻人，更喜欢打电话而不喜欢写信.
话题17-信或卡片.english: Young people today prefer to call rather than write letters.

话题17-信或卡片.chinese: 无论何时收到朋友的来信，我都会感到快乐.
话题17-信或卡片.english: Whenever I receive a letter from a friend I feel happy.

话题17-信或卡片.chinese: 我们大多数人都深受过垃圾邮件的困扰.
话题17-信或卡片.english: Most of us have been harassed by junk mails.

话题17-信或卡片.chinese: 亲笔写的信比电子邮件可以更深刻地表达感情 (心情、心意).
话题17-信或卡片.english: A letter written in pen can express the feelings much more deeply than an e-mail.

话题17-信或卡片.chinese: 电子贺卡因其便捷而更受欢迎.
话题17-信或卡片.english: E-cards are much more popular for its convenience and sending speed.

话题18-礼物.chinese: 在重要的节日，我们互赠礼物.
话题18-礼物.english: We send gifts to each other on important festivals.

话题18-礼物.chinese: 赠送礼物是表达感激的一种方式.
话题18-礼物.english: Sending gifts is a way of expressing your gratitude to some person.

话题18-礼物.chinese: 礼物代表了我们衷心的祝愿.
在人们挑选礼物的时候，他们有被广告影响的倾向.
话题18-礼物.english: When people are choosing gifts, they tend to be influenced by advertisements.

话题18-礼物.chinese: 在我看来，送礼者的诚意 (真心) 比礼物的价钱更为重要.
话题18-礼物.english: In my opinion, the giver's sincerity is more important than the price of the gift.

话题18-礼物.chinese: 我们习惯于把营养品作为礼物送给老人.
话题18-礼物.english: We tend to send nutritious food to old people as gifts.

话题18-礼物.chinese: 挑选礼物的时候应该把收礼者的个人喜好考虑在内.
话题18-礼物.english: Take account of the personal preference of the receiver when choosing a gift.

话题18-礼物.chinese: 当你收到礼物的时候，要表达你的感激之情.
话题18-礼物.english: Show your gratitude when receiving a gift.

话题18-礼物.chinese: 我们中国人收到礼物时，并不当场拆开包装.
话题18-礼物.english: We Chinese people do not open the gift on the spot when receiving it.

话题18-礼物.chinese: 在中国，人们说礼物不值钱时往往只是试图表示谦虚.
话题18-礼物.english: In China when people say the gift is worth nothing they are just trying to be modest.

话题18-礼物.chinese: 相比在大商场买的贵重礼物，我更珍惜手工制作的礼物.
话题18-礼物.english: I value handmade gifts more than expensive gifts bought from big stores.

话题19-手工工艺.chinese: 手工艺品在很多旅游景点作为纪念品出售.
话题19-手工工艺.english: Handicrafts are sold at many tourist sites as souvenirs.

话题19-手工工艺.chinese: 手工艺品比机器制品更花时间，也更精致.
话题19-手工工艺.english: Handicrafts are more time-consuming and delicate than those made by machines.

话题19-手工工艺.chinese: 许多农村地区的人们把制作手工艺品的收入作为生活来源的一部分.
话题19-手工工艺.english: Many people in rural areas make handicrafts as a source of income.

话题19-手工工艺.chinese: 制作手工艺品的技术，比如剪纸，是国家的非物质财富.
话题19-手工工艺.english: The skills to make handicrafts such as paper cutting are national treasures.

话题19-手工工艺.chinese: 制作某些手工艺品的技术濒临失传.
话题19-手工工艺.english: The skills to make some handicrafts are to be lost.

话题19-手工工艺.chinese: 精致的手工艺品深受外宾欢迎.
话题19-手工工艺.english: Refined handicrafts are welcomed by foreign guests.

话题19-手工工艺.chinese: 当地政府应该采取措施保护某些手工艺制作技术.
话题19-手工工艺.english: The local government should take some measures to protect some handicraft making skills.

话题19-手工工艺.chinese: 许多手工艺技术传男不传女.
话题19-手工工艺.english: Many handicraft skills are only passed to male descents of the family.

话题19-手工工艺.chinese: 手工艺品具有鲜明的民族色彩，有利于人们了解当地文化.
话题19-手工工艺.english: Handicrafts are more ethical that can help you understand the culture there.

话题19-手工工艺.chinese: 有时手工艺品因其独特而具有极大的价值.
话题19-手工工艺.english: Handicrafts sometimes are unique so that they're of great value.

话题19-手工工艺.chinese: 机器制品永远也取代不了手工艺品.
话题19-手工工艺.english: Products made by the machine can never take the place of handicrafts.

话题19-手工工艺.chinese: 有些机器制品和手工艺品几乎一模一样，给我们鉴别增加了难度.
话题19-手工工艺.english: Some products made by the machine look almost the same as handicrafts, which become hard for us to tell.

话题20-日记.chinese: 坚持写日记是一种好习惯.
话题20-日记.english: Writing and keeping a diary is a good habit.

话题20-日记.chinese: 我经常把我每天所做的、所看的、所想的都记下来.
话题20-日记.english: I often note down what I did, what I saw and what I thought every day.

话题20-日记.chinese: 我把日记写在网上，而不是记在笔记本上.
话题20-日记.english: I don't write journals in my notebook, but online.

话题20-日记.chinese: 要小心不要在你的日记中泄露了你的隐私.
话题20-日记.english: You have to be careful not to let out your privacy in your journal.

话题20-日记.chinese: 我有一个自己的博客，并且在线发布曰志.
话题20-日记.english: I have a blog of my own and I publish my journals online.

话题20-日记.chinese: 在年轻人中，甚至包括名人，在网上发布日志是一种趋势.
话题20-日记.english: Writing journals online is a trend among young people, even celebrities.

话题20-日记.chinese: 我不介意每天有多少人看我的日志.
话题20-日记.english: I don't mind how many people are reading my journals every day.

话题20-日记.chinese: 日记或者日志可以看作我过去生活的珍藏.
话题20-日记.english: Diaries or journals can be taken as a collection of my past stories.

话题20-日记.chinese: 写作可以让我们思考，保持头脑清醒.
话题20-日记.english: Writing can make us think and keep a clear mind.

话题20-日记.chinese: 因为我的生活节奏快，我都忙得没时间写日记了.
话题20-日记.english: I am too busy to write diaries because my rhythm of life is fast.

话题20-日记.chinese: 在现代世界中，写作是人人必须而有用的一种技能.
话题20-日记.english: Writing is a necessary and useful skill to everyone in the modern world.

话题20-日记.chinese: 通过写作和思考，你能找到自我并且清楚地认识这个世界.
话题20-日记.english: You will find out yourself and see the world clearly if you write and think.

话题21-机器人.chinese: 将来机器人可以帮助我们干些家务杂活.
话题21-机器人.english: Robots can help us do some household chores in future.

话题21-机器人.chinese: 机器人没有感情，他们只能接受预先设置好的程序.
话题21-机器人.english: Robots have no feelings and they only accept predesigned orders.

话题21-机器人.chinese: 机器人能被用在某些有毒、危险的工作场合.
话题21-机器人.english: Robots can be used in some dangerous and poisonous working conditions.

话题21-机器人.chinese: 机器人能比人类工作更有效率.
话题21-机器人.english: Robots work more efficiently than human beings.

话题21-机器人.chinese: 机器人能懂得人类的指令真是不可思议.
话题21-机器人.english: It is amazing that robots can understand our orders.

话题21-机器人.chinese: 如果机器人被广泛利用，我们人类就会有更多休闲时间.
话题21-机器人.english: If robots are widely used, we human beings will have more time to relax.

话题21-机器人.chinese: 就我看来，将来机器人会被广泛使用于工厂.
话题21-机器人.english: As far as I'm concerned, robots will be widely used in factories in future.

话题21-机器人.chinese: 具有人工智能的机器人能自己决定做一些事.
话题21-机器人.english: Robots with artificial intelligence can decide to do something by themselves.

话题21-机器人.chinese: 有些机器人能做我们做不了的事.
话题21-机器人.english: Some robots can do what we can't do.

话题21-机器人.chinese: 将来，所有重复的工作会由机器人完成.
话题21-机器人.english: In future, all those repetitive things will be done by robots.

话题21-机器人.chinese: 无论怎样，机器人是不会替代我们的大脑的.
话题21-机器人.english: No matter how, the robots will not take the place of our brains.

话题21-机器人.chinese: 由 IBM 公司设计的机器人” 深蓝” 是下棋的专家.
话题21-机器人.english: The robot DEEP BLUE designed by IBM is an expert on chess.

话题22-收藏.english: I do not collect stamps to gain money.

话题22-收藏.chinese: 集邮有趣、轻松且花费不大.
话题22-收藏.english: Stamp collecting is full of fun, relaxing and inexpensive.

话题22-收藏.chinese: 有些人收集古钱币作为投资.
话题22-收藏.english: Some people collect ancient coins by way of investment.

话题22-收藏.chinese: 在收集的过程中，我学到了多种学科的许多知识.
话题22-收藏.english: In the process of collecting, I learn a lot of knowledge about a variety of subjects.

话题22-收藏.chinese: 许多人靠收集和处理文物 (东西) 谋生.
话题22-收藏.english: Many people make a living from collecting and disposing items.

话题22-收藏.chinese: 你在收藏的过程中，你需要具有识别、选择、评估和分类等多方面的技能.
话题22-收藏.english: As you build up a collection, it is necessary that you have skills of identifying, selecting, evaluating, classifying items.

话题22-收藏.chinese: 人们收藏几乎所有的东西，包括书籍、邮票、钱币和化石等.
话题22-收藏.english: People collect almost everything, including books, stamps, coins, fossils etc.

话题22-收藏.chinese: 一些人热衷于收藏诸如人骨一类的奇异物品.
话题22-收藏.english: Some people are keen on collecting grotesque items such as human bones.

话题22-收藏.chinese: 人们收藏物品不是出于乐趣就是为了赚钱.
话题22-收藏.english: People collect things either for fun or for money.

话题22-收藏.chinese: 我痴迷于搜集电视明星的照片.
话题22-收藏.english: I'm obsessed with collecting pictures of TV stars.

话题22-收藏.chinese: 收藏可以说是了解中国文化的途径.
话题22-收藏.english: Collecting can be a gateway of understanding China's folk culture.

话题23-颜色.chinese: 很多人认为不同的颜色有不同的作用 (力量).
话题23-颜色.english: Many people believe different colors have different powers.

话题23-颜色.chinese: 颜色能够影响我们的情绪、行为以及如何与人相处 (反应).
话题23-颜色.english: colors can influence our emotions, actions and how we respond to people.

话题23-颜色.chinese: 不同的颜色有不同的象征意义，给人不同的影响.
话题23-颜色.english: Different colors have different symbolic meanings and different effects on people.

话题23-颜色.chinese: 你喜欢的颜色在一定程度上反映你是哪一类的人 (你的性格).
话题23-颜色.english: What color you like to some extent reflects what kind of person you are.

话题23-颜色.chinese: 暖色如红色和橘色使人感到自信、积极和快乐.
话题23-颜色.english: Warm colors such as red and orange make people feel confident, active and happy.

话题23-颜色.chinese: 冷色如蓝色和紫色代表和平、沉思和冷静.
话题23-颜色.english: Cold colors such as blue and purple represent peace, meditation and calmness.

话题23-颜色.chinese: 喜欢暖色的人一般都是乐观主义者.
话题23-颜色.english: People who like warm colors tend to be optimists.

话题23-颜色.chinese: 喜欢冷色的人一般都害羞和安静.
话题23-颜色.english: People who like cold colors are probably shy and quiet.

话题23-颜色.chinese: 我喜欢将房间装饰为橘色，因为 (这样) 它看起来温暖.
话题23-颜色.english: I would like to decorate my room in orange color because it looks warm.

话题23-颜色.chinese: 在中国，红色被认为能够帶来好运.
话题23-颜色.english: In China, red is supposed to bring good luck.

话题23-颜色.chinese: 中国文化中，红色是幸福的象征.
话题23-颜色.english: Red is a sign of happiness in Chinese Culture.

话题24-文化娱乐.chinese: 总的来说，体育文化是人类所有文化中的一种，也是很特殊的一种.
话题24-文化娱乐.english: Physical culture is one kind of the human culture as a whole and also a very special kind.

话题24-文化娱乐.chinese: 以” 奥林匹克精神” 为特点的体育文化已被全世界的人们所接受.
话题24-文化娱乐.english: Physical culture characterized with "Olympic Spirit" has been accepted by the people of the whole world.

话题24-文化娱乐.chinese: 中国文化在历史上从未停止发展.
话题24-文化娱乐.english: China's culture has never stopped developing throughout history.

话题24-文化娱乐.chinese: 中国文化通过与世界 (其他文化) 的交流得以丰富.
话题24-文化娱乐.english: China's culture has enriched itself through mutual exchange in the world.

话题24-文化娱乐.chinese: 最近几年，面对观众日渐减少的局面，京剧做了很多的改革.
话题24-文化娱乐.english: In recent years, Beijing opera has attempted numerous reforms in response to sagging audience numbers.

话题24-文化娱乐.chinese: 京剧形成于 18 世纪末，在 19 世纪中期得到全面发展和认可.
话题24-文化娱乐.english: Beijing Opera arose in the late 18th century and became fully developed and recognized by the mid-19th century.

话题24-文化娱乐.chinese: 上个月，我到中国国家大剧院观看了名为《雷雨》的话剧.
话题24-文化娱乐.english: Last month I went to Chinese National Grand Theatre to see a play called Thunderstorm.

话题24-文化娱乐.chinese: 我们能通过 KTV 得到完全的放松.
话题24-文化娱乐.english: We can relax ourselves in KTV thoroughly.

话题24-文化娱乐.chinese: 有时我们可以到游乐场 (欢乐公园) 释放压力.
话题24-文化娱乐.english: Sometimes we can go to amusement park to relieve the pressure.

话题24-文化娱乐.chinese: 电影节是我最爱的节曰，因为我可以观看很多电影.
话题24-文化娱乐.english: Movie Season is my favorite holiday because I would have a lot of films to enjoy.

话题24-文化娱乐.chinese: 对我们来说，和朋友一起聚会、放松是难得的节曰.
话题24-文化娱乐.english: It is a great time for us to gather with our friends and relax.

话题24-文化娱乐.chinese: (它) 对所有公民免费，但是总有很多人，所以你不得不排很长的队.
话题24-文化娱乐.english: It is free to all citizens, but always you can see too many people and you've got to wait in a long queue.

话题25-电影.chinese: 每个周末我会看一部经典 (好) 的老电影.
话题25-电影.english: I watch a good old film every weekend.

话题25-电影.chinese: 那部电影真的催人泪下.
话题25-电影.english: That movie is a real tear-jerker.

话题25-电影.chinese: 这是一部不容错过的电影.
话题25-电影.english: It is a movie that shouldn't be missed.

话题25-电影.chinese: 一部好电影有时会是票房的巨大失败.
话题25-电影.english: A great movie can sometimes be a big flop at the box office.

话题25-电影.chinese: 一部好电影应该迎合观众的口味.
话题25-电影.english: A good film should cater to public taste.

话题25-电影.chinese: 许多年轻人崇拜电影里的英雄，作为自己的偶像.
话题25-电影.english: Many young people worship heroes in films as idols.

话题25-电影.chinese: 父母不能让孩子观看帶有粗俗言语的电影.
话题25-电影.english: Parents should not let their children watch films with raw language.

话题25-电影.chinese: 香港功夫电影享有很好的国际声誉.
话题25-电影.english: Hong Kong Kungfu films enjoy international reputation.

话题25-电影.chinese: 我喜欢有冒险情节和漂亮女演员的电影.
话题25-电影.english: I like those films with an adventurous plot and beautiful actresses.

话题25-电影.chinese: 好的电影应有教育意义.
话题25-电影.english: A good movie should be educative.

话题25-电影.chinese: 好的电影经常能够提供更好的方式满足我们自己.
话题25-电影.english: A good movie often provides us a better way to pamper ourselves.

话题26-爱好.chinese: 在空余时间，我喜欢和朋友一起闲逛.
话题26-爱好.english: In my spare time, I like to hang out with my friends.
Surfing is not my cup of tea.

话题26-爱好.chinese: 健康的爱好使人轻松，帶来快乐.
话题26-爱好.english: A healthy hobby relaxes people and provides fun.

话题26-爱好.chinese: 我在自己的兴趣爱好上花了大量时间和精力.
话题26-爱好.english: I spend a lot of time and energy on my hobby.

话题26-爱好.chinese: 过度沉湎于自己的爱好而忽视工作是不好的.
话题26-爱好.english: Too much absorbed in one's hobby and neglecting work are not good.

话题26-爱好.chinese: 我对集邮有强烈的激情.
话题26-爱好.english: I have a strong passion of collecting stamps.

话题26-爱好.chinese: 我从小学六年级就开始有这个兴趣爱好.
话题26-爱好.english: I began to pick up this hobby when I was in grade six in primary school.

话题26-爱好.chinese: 这个爱好给了我结交更多朋友的机会.
话题26-爱好.english: This hobby has given me an opportunity to make more friends.

话题26-爱好.chinese: 有共同兴趣的朋友会有许多的交流.
话题26-爱好.english: Friends with common interests would have a lot to exchange.

话题26-爱好.chinese: 我在此上花了大量的业余时间.
话题26-爱好.english: I've devoted much of my spare time to it.

话题26-爱好.chinese: 你有多大的兴趣决定了你有多大的收获.
话题26-爱好.english: How much you are interested in will decide how much you can get from it.

话题27-音乐.chinese: 莫扎特是我最喜欢的音乐家.
我只为说唱音乐而疯狂.
话题27-音乐.english: I am simply crazy about rap music.

话题27-音乐.chinese: 节奏布鲁斯在年轻人中间很流行.
话题27-音乐.english: R & B is popular among young people.
I often go to KTV with my friends.

话题27-音乐.chinese: 我每年都从电视上收听维也纳新年音乐会.
话题27-音乐.english: I listen to the Vienna New Year concert on TV every year.
Rock and Roll is rich in passion.

话题27-音乐.chinese: 我在六岁时开始学习钢琴.
话题27-音乐.english: I started playing the piano at the age of six.
The Phantom of Opera is very touching.
The singer has an excellent voice.

话题28-照相.chinese: 这些照片把我拍难看了.
话题28-照相.english: These photographs do not do me justice.

话题28-照相.chinese: 这本相册中充满了很多回忆.
话题28-照相.english: The photo album is full of memories.

话题28-照相.chinese: 照片捕捉了那些和家人、朋友在一起的快乐时光.
话题28-照相.english: Photographs catch the happy moments spent with friends and family.

话题28-照相.chinese: 摄影是一门神奇的艺术形式.
话题28-照相.english: Photography is an amazing art form.

话题28-照相.chinese: 我喜欢翻看别人的照片.
我在那些难忘的时刻，如生日和节日的时候，会拍些照片.
话题28-照相.english: I take pictures at memorable events, such as birthdays and festivals.

话题28-照相.chinese: 拍照是保存和分享记忆的一种方式.
话题28-照相.english: Taking photos is a way of saving and sharing memories.

话题28-照相.chinese: 数码相机是 21 世纪最伟大的发明之一.
话题28-照相.english: Digital camera is one of the greatest inventions of the twenty-first century.

话题28-照相.chinese: 很多人用 Photoshop 软件美化他们的形象.
话题28-照相.english: Many people use Photoshop to better their image.

话题28-照相.chinese: 拍摄虚假照片违背新闻记者的职业道德.
话题28-照相.english: Taking false pictures is against the working ethics of the journalist.
I took picture when I was on vacation.

话题29-购物.chinese: 现在的女孩子痴迷于购物.
话题29-购物.english: Girls today are fascinated with shopping.

话题29-购物.chinese: 我把浏览商店橱窗当作一种消遣方式.
话题29-购物.english: I go window shopping as a way of recreation.

话题29-购物.chinese: 对于很多西方人来说，圣诞节是个购物的季节.
话题29-购物.english: For many Westerners, Christmas is the shopping season.

话题29-购物.chinese: 现代购物中心整合了很多功能，如餐饮和娱乐.
话题29-购物.english: The modern shopping malls integrate many functions, such as catering and recreation.

话题29-购物.chinese: 我喜欢去小店购物，因为东西便宜.
话题29-购物.english: I go shopping in small store because things there are much cheaper.

话题29-购物.chinese: 经常去百货商场购物对于一个普通大学生而言是无法承受的.
话题29-购物.english: An ordinary university student could not afford shopping in department stores often.
Luxury is beyond my buying ability.

话题29-购物.chinese: 边远地区的购买力已经提升.
话题29-购物.english: The purchasing power of the rural regions has increased.
My mother is a comparison shopper.

话题29-购物.chinese: 我总是去小市场拣便宜货.
话题29-购物.english: I always go bargain hunting in small markets.

话题29-购物.chinese: 随着居民消费指数的提升，生活变得越来越难.
话题29-购物.english: With the sharp rising of CPI, life becomes harder.

话题29-购物.chinese: 我的室友是个沖动的购物者.
话题29-购物.english: My roommate is an impulse shopper.

话题30-运动.chinese: 我每天下午四点到六点打羽毛球.
话题30-运动.english: I play badminton from four to six o'clock every afternoon.

话题30-运动.chinese: 每天我看到很多人在公园慢跑.
话题30-运动.english: I see lots of people jogging in the park every day.

话题30-运动.chinese: 在所有运动项目中，羽毛球是我最喜欢的.
话题30-运动.english: Among all the sports activities, badminton is my favorite.

话题30-运动.chinese: 运动员应该尊重体育精神.
奥运会有几十个运动项目.
话题30-运动.english: There are scores of sport events in the Olympics.

话题30-运动.chinese: 一届成功的奥运会将展示中国体育的迅猛发展.
话题30-运动.english: A successful Olympic Game will demonstrate China's rapid development in sports.

话题30-运动.chinese: 乒乓球在我的家乡是最流行的运动.
话题30-运动.english: Table tennis is the most popular sport in my hometown.

话题30-运动.chinese: 中国人正越来越关注健身.
话题30-运动.english: Chinese people are playing more and more attention to body exercising.

话题30-运动.chinese: 诸如篮球、足球等运动可以锻炼我们的团队精神.
话题30-运动.english: Sports like basketball, football could train our team spirit.

话题30-运动.chinese: 只工作，不玩耍，聪明的孩子也变傻.
话题30-运动.english: All work and no play makes jack a dull boy.

话题31-旅游.chinese: 如果我有足够的时间和金钱，我想去环游世界.
话题31-旅游.english: If I had enough time and money, I would like to travel around the world.

话题31-旅游.chinese: 我喜欢独自去乡下旅行.
话题31-旅游.english: I like to travel alone in the countryside.

话题31-旅游.chinese: 我的假期经常用来旅行.
话题31-旅游.english: I spend my holidays on travelling.

话题31-旅游.chinese: 旅行可以让一个人成熟.
话题31-旅游.english: Travelling makes a person more mature.

话题31-旅游.chinese: 旅行期间，你可以结识不同的人.
话题31-旅游.english: You may run into different people while travelling.
I have been to many places of interest.

话题31-旅游.chinese: 旅行时要记得带上一些药.
话题31-旅游.english: Remember to bring some medicine with you while travelling.

话题31-旅游.chinese: 一个人旅行的时候不要去危险的地方.
话题31-旅游.english: Do not go to dangerous places while traveling alone.

话题31-旅游.chinese: 有鬼神出没的地方可能吸引观光者.
话题31-旅游.english: Ghost haunted places can be tourist attractions.

话题31-旅游.chinese: 中国的旅游业正在蓬勃发展.
话题31-旅游.english: The tourism is flourishing in China.

话题31-旅游.chinese: 对许多家庭来说，泰国五日游是欢度春节的最佳选择.
话题31-旅游.english: A five-day tour of Thailand is a first choice for many families to spend their spring festival.

话题32-网站和网上购物.chinese: 我们可以在网上购买各种东西.
话题32-网站和网上购物.english: We can buy all kinds of things online.

话题32-网站和网上购物.chinese: E-bay 是一个大型购物网站.
话题32-网站和网上购物.english: E-bay is a large shopping website.

话题32-网站和网上购物.chinese: 网上购物时，特别注意你账户信息的安全.
话题32-网站和网上购物.english: When e-shopping, pay particular attention to safekeeping your account information.

话题32-网站和网上购物.chinese: 网上购物前，确信你知道物品的所有细节.
话题32-网站和网上购物.english: Before e-shopping, be sure that you know all the details of the article.

话题32-网站和网上购物.chinese: 收到货物之后，你要仔细检查你的物品.
话题32-网站和网上购物.english: You should check your goods carefully after receiving it.

话题32-网站和网上购物.chinese: 在可信赖的网站交易 (购物).
网上购物都是便宜货，因为你总可以得到打折的机会.
话题32-网站和网上购物.english: Shopping online is a bargain because you can always get a discount.

话题32-网站和网上购物.chinese: 我不是非常热衷于网上购物.
话题32-网站和网上购物.english: I am not particularly keen on e-shopping.

话题32-网站和网上购物.chinese: 网上购物有被骗的潜在危险.
话题32-网站和网上购物.english: E-shopping has the potential danger of being cheated.

话题32-网站和网上购物.chinese: 网上购物的缺点之一就是，在你收到商品之前你不可能看到它.
话题32-网站和网上购物.english: One of the disadvantages of e-shopping is that you are not able to see the commodity until you receive it.

话题32-网站和网上购物.chinese: 较之网上购物，我更喜欢以传统方式购物.
话题32-网站和网上购物.english: I prefer shopping in a traditional way to e-shopping.

话题33-艺术技能.chinese: 有些父母强迫他们的孩子学习一门或多门艺术技能.
话题33-艺术技能.english: Some parents force their children to learn one or more than one artistic skills.

话题33-艺术技能.chinese: 许多年轻人对艺术课程，而不是其他课程疯狂着迷.
话题33-艺术技能.english: A lot of young people are crazy about art courses instead of other subjects.
Art is of great importance to everyone.

话题33-艺术技能.chinese: 我喜欢街舞，且曾经在比赛中获得一等奖.
话题33-艺术技能.english: I like hip-hop dance and I once won a first prize in a competition.

话题33-艺术技能.chinese: 艺术可以看作是我们表达感情的另一种方式.
话题33-艺术技能.english: Art can be regarded as another way to express our feelings.

话题33-艺术技能.chinese: 艺术院校在中国越来越受欢迎.
话题33-艺术技能.english: Art colleges are becoming more and more popular in China.

话题33-艺术技能.chinese: 学习一项艺术技能对人的想象力有好处.
话题33-艺术技能.english: Learning an artistic skill is good for one's imagination.
I am good at playing the Chinese violin.

话题33-艺术技能.chinese: 有些快速的艺术培训课程毫无用处.
话题33-艺术技能.english: Some art crash training course is of no use at all.

话题33-艺术技能.chinese: 无论你想学哪样艺术技能，你都必须准备长时间地学习它.
话题33-艺术技能.english: No matter what artistic skill you want to learn, you have to be ready to learn it for a long time.

话题33-艺术技能.chinese: 短期内掌握一项艺术技能不是那么容易.
话题33-艺术技能.english: It is not that easy to master an artistic skill within a short period of time.

话题34-最喜欢的歌.chinese: 有些人说唱歌在一定程度上能够减肥.
话题34-最喜欢的歌.english: Some people say singing can lose your weight to some extent.

话题34-最喜欢的歌.chinese: 我经常和朋友去 KTV 消遣.
话题34-最喜欢的歌.english: I often go to KTV with my friends for relaxation.

话题34-最喜欢的歌.chinese: 去 KTV 唱歌是和朋友沟通的一种方式.
话题34-最喜欢的歌.english: Singing in KTV is a way to communicate with my friends.

话题34-最喜欢的歌.chinese: 这段旋律能够使你情緒高昂.
我喜欢那些能够欣赏到背景音乐的购物中心.
话题34-最喜欢的歌.english: I like those shopping centres where you can enjoy background music.

话题34-最喜欢的歌.chinese: 我最喜欢的歌曲是玛丽亚？凯瑞演唱的《只要你相信》.
话题34-最喜欢的歌.english: My favorite song is named when you believe by Maria Kerrey.

话题34-最喜欢的歌.chinese: 我喜欢这首歌曲是因为其歌词令人难以忘怀.
话题34-最喜欢的歌.english: I like this song because the lyrics are unforgettable.

话题34-最喜欢的歌.chinese: 该乐队的歌曲都激动人心.
话题34-最喜欢的歌.english: The songs of this band are all encouraging.

话题34-最喜欢的歌.chinese: 从某种程度上 (来说), 音乐就是一种语言.
话题34-最喜欢的歌.english: In a sense, music is a language.

话题34-最喜欢的歌.chinese: 民歌有强烈的地方特色.
话题34-最喜欢的歌.english: Folk songs have strong local color.

话题34-最喜欢的歌.chinese: 古典音乐听起来很优雅.
唱诗班的演唱像天使一样.

话题35-游戏.chinese: 游戏是一种放松和打发时间的方式.
话题35-游戏.english: Game is a way to relax and kill time.

话题35-游戏.chinese: 不要浪费太多的时间来玩电脑 (PC) 游戏.
话题35-游戏.english: Do not waste too much of your time playing PC games.

话题35-游戏.chinese: 我对电脑游戏根本不上瘾.
话题35-游戏.english: I am not addicted to PC games at all.

话题35-游戏.chinese: 有些游戏 (活动) 可以锻炼 (训练) 我们的逻辑思维和创造性思维.
话题35-游戏.english: Some games can practise our logical and creative thinking.

话题35-游戏.chinese: 来自美国的一些游戏，玩的时候，可以帮助我学习英语.
话题35-游戏.english: Some games from America can help me learn English while playing.

话题35-游戏.chinese: 游戏中的人物与希腊神话中的人物非常相像.
话题35-游戏.english: The figures in the game are quite the same as those in Greek fairy tales.

话题35-游戏.chinese: 有些游戏中含有太多的暴力，这对年轻人一点好处都没有.
话题35-游戏.english: Some games contain too much violence, which is no good for young people at all.

话题35-游戏.chinese: 玩网络游戏有利于我们结交更多的朋友.
话题35-游戏.english: Playing online games can let us make more friends.

话题35-游戏.chinese: 我更喜欢角色扮演游戏，而不喜欢射击游戏.
话题35-游戏.english: I am interested in RPG games rather than shooting games.

话题35-游戏.chinese: 我是个孩子的时候，常玩的游戏是捉迷藏、警察与小偷等.
话题35-游戏.english: When I was a child, I played games like hide-and-seek, police and thief etc.

话题35-游戏.chinese: 我小的时候没有太多的游戏可玩.
话题35-游戏.english: I didn't have many games to play when I was a child.

话题36-将来的计划.chinese: 我希望将来找一个待遇好的工作.
话题36-将来的计划.english: I hope I will make a decent pay in the future.

话题36-将来的计划.chinese: 从现在开始五年后，我将担当一个中型企业经理的职务.
话题36-将来的计划.english: Five years from now I would be in a managerial position of a medium-sized company.

话题36-将来的计划.chinese: 我计划在大学里得到英语和经济学的双学位.
话题36-将来的计划.english: I plan to have a double major in English and economics in college.

话题36-将来的计划.chinese: 我想，这个暑假我应该找一些短期的实习机会.
话题36-将来的计划.english: I think I'd better find some short-time workplace attachment opportunities this summer.

话题36-将来的计划.chinese: 大学毕业后，我将继续进行硕士学位学习.
话题36-将来的计划.english: After graduating from university, I would like to go on studying for a master's degree.

话题36-将来的计划.chinese: 跳槽 (改变工作) 在年轻人中司空见惯.
话题36-将来的计划.english: Job-hopping is common among young people.

话题36-将来的计划.chinese: 我的梦想是成为一名大学教师.
话题36-将来的计划.english: My dream is to become a college teacher.

话题36-将来的计划.chinese: 为了将来有好的工作，我应 (逐步) 提高我的个人技能.
话题36-将来的计划.english: In order to have a good job in the future, I shall develop my personal skills.

话题36-将来的计划.chinese: 我喜欢在不同的领域挑战自我.
话题36-将来的计划.english: I'd like to challenge myself in different fields.

话题36-将来的计划.chinese: 我想参加一个速成班来提高我的电脑水平.
话题36-将来的计划.english: I want to attend a speed-up course to improve my computer skills.

话题36-将来的计划.chinese: 除了必修课程，我将根据自己的兴趣、未来的计划和能力选修二三门课程.
话题36-将来的计划.english: Apart from the compulsory course, I'll choose two or three subjects depending on my interests, future plans and ability.

话题36-将来的计划.chinese: 下学期，我将充分利用图书馆来充实自己的知识.
话题36-将来的计划.english: I'll make full use of our library to arm myself with much knowledge next semester.

话题37-长期出国.chinese: 我将去英国学习一年英语.
话题37-长期出国.english: I am go to the UK for a year to study English.

话题37-长期出国.chinese: 出国学习，拥有英语环境对英语学习者来说有好处.
话题37-长期出国.english: It is good for English learners to go abroad to study and have an English environment.

话题37-长期出国.chinese: 在国外，你应当非常注意当地习俗.
话题37-长期出国.english: In foreign countries, you should pay attention to the local customs.

话题37-长期出国.chinese: 出国之前做好充分准备.
话题37-长期出国.english: Make enough preparation before you go abroad.

话题37-长期出国.chinese: 确信自己掌握了你将去的国家的一些习俗.
话题37-长期出国.english: Make sure that you have learned some customs about the country you are going to.

话题37-长期出国.chinese: 如果你挑食，最好在出国之前学习一些烹调技能.
话题37-长期出国.english: If you're picky about food, you'd better learn some cooking skills before you go abroad.

话题37-长期出国.chinese: 近年来，成千上万的学生出国学习.
话题37-长期出国.english: In recent years, tens of thousands of students go to foreign countries to study.

话题37-长期出国.chinese: 在国外时，如果无人可以依靠，你会觉得很茫然.
话题37-长期出国.english: You will be at a loss when there's nobody to rely on in a foreign country.

话题37-长期出国.chinese: 入乡随俗 (如果你在罗马，就应该像罗马人那样做).
话题37-长期出国.english: When you are in Rome, do as the Romans do.

话题37-长期出国.chinese: 同当地人多沟通是提高英语的好办法.
话题37-长期出国.english: More communication with the native speakers would be a good way to improve English.

话题37-长期出国.chinese: 到国外学习能够开拓我的视野、丰富我的知识.
话题37-长期出国.english: Studying abroad would broaden my horizon and enrich my knowledge.

话题37-长期出国.chinese: 我知道，如果我出国，我不得不尽力适应新环境.
话题37-长期出国.english: I know I have to try my best to adapt to a new environment if I go abroad.

话题38-一个重要的决定.chinese: 当我还是小姑娘的时候，一切事情我都依靠父母来决定.
话题38-一个重要的决定.english: When I was a little girl, I relied on my parents to guide my decisions about everything.

话题38-一个重要的决定.chinese: 结婚是你一生中最重要的决定之一.
话题38-一个重要的决定.english: To get married is one of the most important decisions you can make in life.
This is a decision of life and death.

话题38-一个重要的决定.chinese: 在你决定写哪个题目之前必须请教你的导师.
话题38-一个重要的决定.english: You should consult your supervisor before you decide which topic to write about.

话题38-一个重要的决定.chinese: 在作关于移民、投资等决定之前最好请教专家.
话题38-一个重要的决定.english: When making decisions concerning migration, investment etc. , we'd better ask help from expert.

话题38-一个重要的决定.chinese: 这个决定标志着我人生的转折点.
话题38-一个重要的决定.english: This decision symbolizes a turning point of my life.

话题38-一个重要的决定.chinese: 我们不能盲目地采纳父母所有的意见.
话题38-一个重要的决定.english: We can't follow blindly all of our parents' advice.

话题38-一个重要的决定.chinese: 作决定是件困难的事情.
话题38-一个重要的决定.english: Making decisions is a tough job.

话题38-一个重要的决定.chinese: 我想当老师的决定很大程度上是由于父母的鼓励.
话题38-一个重要的决定.english: My decision to become a teacher is largely due to my parents' encouragement.

话题38-一个重要的决定.chinese: 到美国深造的决定为我打开了一扇新的窗户.
话题38-一个重要的决定.english: The decision of furthering my study in US opens a new window for me.

话题38-一个重要的决定.chinese: 作那样的决定我一定是头晕了.
话题38-一个重要的决定.english: I must be doited to make that decision.

话题38-一个重要的决定.chinese: 一旦作出错误的决定，几乎很难有机会来弥补.
话题38-一个重要的决定.english: Once a wrong decision is made, rarely is there an opportunity to amend for it.

话题39-快乐的事件.chinese: 在我的有生之年，我将记住这幸福时刻.
话题39-快乐的事件.english: I will remember this happy event as long as I live.

话题39-快乐的事件.chinese: 对不同的人来说，幸褐有不同的含义.
话题39-快乐的事件.english: Happiness means different things to different people.
Happiness could not be bought with money.

话题39-快乐的事件.chinese: 对我来说，幸福就是紧紧地和家人联系在一起.
话题39-快乐的事件.english: For me, my happiness is closely tied to my family.

话题39-快乐的事件.chinese: 我永远不会忘记事情发生的那一天.
话题39-快乐的事件.english: I will never forget the day that event happened.

话题39-快乐的事件.chinese: 俗话说，乐极生悲 (极度的快乐带来痛苦).
话题39-快乐的事件.english: As the saying goes, extreme joy begets sorrow.

话题39-快乐的事件.chinese: 知足常乐 (容易满足的人始终幸福、快乐).
话题39-快乐的事件.english: Those who are easily content are always happy.

话题39-快乐的事件.chinese: 幸福不能建立在别人的痛苦之上 (幸福不能以别人利益为代价而获得).
话题39-快乐的事件.english: Happiness should not be achieved at the expense of others' interests.

话题39-快乐的事件.chinese: 对我来说，工作是快乐之源.
话题39-快乐的事件.english: For me working is the source of happiness.
I was having the time of my life.

话题39-快乐的事件.chinese: 我们在聚会上玩得很开心.
话题39-快乐的事件.english: We had a whale of a time at that party.

话题39-快乐的事件.chinese: 听到这个消息，我高兴极了.
话题39-快乐的事件.english: When I heard the news I was as happy as a lark.

话题40-成功.chinese: 成功的男人有自己的目标，并为实现它而奋斗.
话题40-成功.english: A successful man always has a goal and strives to realize the goal.
Money is not equal to success.

话题40-成功.chinese: 我为他取得的成功感到骄傲.
话题40-成功.english: I'm proud of the success that he has achieved.

话题40-成功.chinese: 要想成功，你必须笨鸟先飞 (领先别人一步).
话题40-成功.english: To be successful you have to keep one step ahead other people.

话题40-成功.chinese: 对我来说，胜利意味着一切.
当看到成功的机会，千万不要犹豫。一定要抓住它.
话题40-成功.english: When seeing an opportunity for success, don't hesitate to go for it.

话题40-成功.chinese: 我们不能为了自己的成功而践踏他人.
话题40-成功.english: We should not step on others in order to achieve our own success.

话题40-成功.chinese: 拥有和谐的家庭是另一种形式的成功.
话题40-成功.english: To have a harmonious family is another form of success.

话题40-成功.chinese: 在你成功之前，你会遇到很多的失败.
话题40-成功.english: Before you succeed, you may encounter with many failures.

话题40-成功.chinese: 我要感谢父母的支持，这对于我的成功至关重要.
话题40-成功.english: I am grateful to my parents for their support, which is essential to my success.

话题40-成功.chinese: 我们学习别人的成功经验.
话题40-成功.english: We learn from other people's success.

话题41-艺术活动.chinese: 同学们积极申请加入戏剧俱乐部.
话题41-艺术活动.english: The students actively apply for the Drama club.

话题41-艺术活动.chinese: 戏剧俱乐部在春季上演年度戏剧.
话题41-艺术活动.english: The Drama club presents the play of the year in spring.

话题41-艺术活动.chinese: 作为一名艺术爱好者，一有机会我就会参加艺术品展览.
话题41-艺术活动.english: As an art lover, I always go to art exhibitions whenever I have the chance.

话题41-艺术活动.chinese: 京刷是中国一种传统的艺术形式.
话题41-艺术活动.english: Beijing opera is a traditional form of art in China.

话题41-艺术活动.chinese: 现在的年轻人不会欣赏传统艺术.
话题41-艺术活动.english: Young people nowadays cannot appreciate traditional art.

话题41-艺术活动.chinese: 为了保护传统中国艺术，我们应该培养孩子 (对艺术) 的兴趣.
话题41-艺术活动.english: To protect the traditional Chinese art, we should nurture children's interest in them.
Traditional art is a national treasure.

话题41-艺术活动.chinese: 我们应该将文化遗产传给 (即将到来的) 下一代.
话题41-艺术活动.english: We should pass on the cultural heritage to the coming generation.

话题41-艺术活动.chinese: 现在，许多年轻人对传统艺术完全没有兴趣.
话题41-艺术活动.english: Now some young people have no interest in the traditional art at all.

话题41-艺术活动.chinese: 政府应该给保护传统艺术更多的支持.
话题41-艺术活动.english: The government should give much support to the protection of the traditional arts.

话题41-艺术活动.chinese: 要建立更多的学校、美术馆和博物馆，让人们知道什么是艺术.
话题41-艺术活动.english: More schools, galleries and museums should be set up to let people know what art is.

话题41-艺术活动.chinese: 国际文化交流是一种联系世界各国人民的良好方式.
话题41-艺术活动.english: International cultural exchange is a good way to contact with people in the world.

话题42-开公司.chinese: 自己做生意最大的好处是你是自己的老板.
话题42-开公司.english: The biggest advantage of starting your own business is that you are your own boss.

话题42-开公司.chinese: 一个好的老板应该学会怎么正确解决劳工问题.
话题42-开公司.english: A good boss shall learn to handle the labor problems correctly.

话题42-开公司.chinese: 不要雇用总是混日子的雇员.
话题42-开公司.english: Don't hire employees who are always goofing off.

话题42-开公司.chinese: 好的雇主允许员工自由交谈.
话题42-开公司.english: Good employers allow employees to talk freely with one another.

话题42-开公司.chinese: 一个好的老板应该试图减少工作中员工之间的摩擦.
话题42-开公司.english: A good boss will try his best to reduce personal conflicts on the job.

话题42-开公司.chinese: 一个好的老板应该给予员工干好本职工作的充分的自主权.
话题42-开公司.english: A good boss gives employees adequate control over how they do their work.

话题42-开公司.chinese: 如果我自己开公司的话，我就有权调控自己的工作了.
话题42-开公司.english: If I run a company of my own, I'll have some control over how I perform my work.

话题42-开公司.chinese: 我将雇用那些有能力轻而易举地表达自己观点的人.
话题42-开公司.english: I will employ those who have an ability to verbalise an idea easily.

话题42-开公司.chinese: 在工作中有灵活性的员工，会逐步培养对公司难以置信的忠诚.
话题42-开公司.english: Employees who work with flexibility develop an incredible sense of loyalty.

话题42-开公司.chinese: 我只雇用忠实且诚实的员工.
话题42-开公司.english: I only employ those loyal and faithful employees.

话题42-开公司.chinese: 聪明机智的人并不一定意味着他是一个好的员工.
话题42-开公司.english: Being smart and intelligent doesn't mean that he is a good worker.

话题42-开公司.chinese: 开一家自己的公司将给我带来强烈的成就感.
话题42-开公司.english: Running a company of my own will bring me a great sense of success.

话题43-生活中的变化.chinese: 近几年我的家乡发生了巨大的变化.
话题43-生活中的变化.english: Great changes have taken place in my hometown in recent years.

话题43-生活中的变化.chinese: 由于经济的发展，我家乡的人们 (正) 过着更好的生活.
话题43-生活中的变化.english: Due to the development of economy, people in my hometown are living a better life.

话题43-生活中的变化.chinese: 我的性格已经发生了很大的变化 (我个性变化很大).
话题43-生活中的变化.english: I have changed a lot in personality.

话题43-生活中的变化.chinese: 我过去是个羞涩的男孩，可是现在我自信而性格外向.
话题43-生活中的变化.english: I was once a shy boy in the past, but now I am confident and extrovert.

话题43-生活中的变化.chinese: 你简直不能想象十年后的生活会是怎样的.
话题43-生活中的变化.english: You could hardly imagine how your life would be like ten years later.

话题43-生活中的变化.chinese: 环境日趋恶化，世界人民都在为此担心.
话题43-生活中的变化.english: Environment is getting worse so that people in the world are worrying about it.

话题43-生活中的变化.chinese: 我生活中的最大变化就是我的思维方式 (的变化).
话题43-生活中的变化.english: The greatest change in my life is my way of thinking.

话题43-生活中的变化.chinese: 生活 (命) 是多彩的，因为它充满了变化.
话题43-生活中的变化.english: Life is colorful because it is full of change.

话题43-生活中的变化.chinese: 生活就像一盒巧克力，你永远都不会知道你会得到什么.
话题43-生活中的变化.english: Life is like a box of chocolate and you never know what you are going to get.

话题43-生活中的变化.chinese: 只要我不断地努力，我知道我的生活会发生很大变化.
话题43-生活中的变化.english: As long as I am striving forward, I know I could make big changes of my life.

话题43-生活中的变化.chinese: 每一个人都会越来越好，只要他拥有一个梦想并为此不断地努力.
话题43-生活中的变化.english: Everyone can be better and better if he has a dream and tries his best to realize the dream.

话题43-生活中的变化.chinese: 我的未来会有困难和挫折，可是我已为此做好了准备.
话题43-生活中的变化.english: I may have difficulties and frustrations in future, but I am ready for it.

话题44-经济活动.chinese: 我对经济学很感兴趣，并且我读了很多与经济有关的报道.
话题44-经济活动.english: I am interested in economics and I read a lot of reports on economy.

话题44-经济活动.chinese: 每年在中央电视台都会有一个叫” 年度经济人物” 的评选活动的节目.
话题44-经济活动.english: Every year on CCTV, there is a competition named "Annual Economic Figures".

话题44-经济活动.chinese: 这些人物已经推动了中国经济的发展.
话题44-经济活动.english: Those figures have pushed forward the development of Chinese economy.

话题44-经济活动.chinese: 他们所做的一切都对中国人民的生活产生了很大的影响.
话题44-经济活动.english: What they did has had a great influence on people's life in China.

话题44-经济活动.chinese: 他们已经为我们每个人树立了榜样.
话题44-经济活动.english: They have set up models for every one of us.

话题44-经济活动.chinese: 经济活动通常给公司提供商业机遇.
话题44-经济活动.english: Economic activities usually provide business opportunities for companies.

话题44-经济活动.chinese: 我曾经去过广州参加一年一度的商品交易会.
话题44-经济活动.english: I once went to Guangzhou to attend the annual trade fair.

话题44-经济活动.chinese: 广州商品交易会被世界看成是世界公司的第一名片.
话题44-经济活动.english: Guangzhou Trade Fair is regarded as the first "Name Card" of world companies.

话题44-经济活动.chinese: 对于国内企业而言，这是对外贸易的一个窗口.
话题44-经济活动.english: It is a window of foreign trade for domestic companies.

话题44-经济活动.chinese: 每年 9 月份，在我的城市都有一个大型的陶瓷博览会.
话题44-经济活动.english: Every year in September, there is a great ceramic fair in my city.

话题44-经济活动.chinese: 大量的人被吸引到这里来，这对于一个城市而言像一个假曰.
话题44-经济活动.english: A great number of people are attracted here and it is like a holiday for the city.

话题44-经济活动.chinese: 一些经济组织在国际合作方面正起到一个积极的作用.
话题44-经济活动.english: Some economic organisations are playing a positive role in international cooperation.

话题45-家乡.chinese: 我来自奉宁，那是一个只有 20000 人的小镇.
话题45-家乡.english: I came from Fengning which is a small town with 20,000 people.

话题45-家乡.chinese: 那是一个有许多人口、汽车和建筑物的大城市.
话题45-家乡.english: It's a large city with many people, cars and architectures.

话题45-家乡.chinese: 我特别喜爱家乡的宁静生活.
话题45-家乡.english: I especially love the peaceful life in my hometown.

话题45-家乡.chinese: 由于历史悠久，这个城市有许多名胜古迹.
话题45-家乡.english: With a long history, the city has many historical scenic spots.

话题45-家乡.chinese: 我希望能够为家乡消除污染作出自己的贡献.
话题45-家乡.english: I hope I could make some contribution to the elimination of pollution in my hometown.

话题45-家乡.chinese: 五年后，我发现家乡发生了很大的变化.
话题45-家乡.english: After five years, I found that my hometown had greatly changed.

话题45-家乡.chinese: 生活在我家乡的人们都很淳朴、单纯.
话题45-家乡.english: The people living in my hometown are unsophisticated and simple.

话题45-家乡.chinese: 这个城市是重要的交通枢纽.
话题45-家乡.english: The city is an important transportation hub.

话题45-家乡.chinese: 纺织工业是这个城市的支柱 (产业).
话题45-家乡.english: Textile industry is the mainstay of the city.

话题45-家乡.chinese: 我的家乡因陶瓷而闻名.
话题45-家乡.english: My hometown is famous for pottery and porcelain.

话题45-家乡.chinese: 我家乡的人们都友好、热情.
话题45-家乡.english: People in my hometown are hospitable and warm-hearted.

话题45-家乡.chinese: 这是个新兴城市，发展速度很快.
话题45-家乡.english: It is a booming city and is developing at a rapid speed.

话题46-博物馆.chinese: 上海博物馆是我见过的印象最深的博物馆.
话题46-博物馆.english: The Shanghai museum is the most impressive one that I have ever seen.
I prefer to go to history museums.

话题46-博物馆.chinese: 中国很多博物馆票价都很便宜.
话题46-博物馆.english: Most of the museums in China cost little in tickets.

话题46-博物馆.chinese: 上个月新政策实施，北京很多博物馆都免费开放.
话题46-博物馆.english: Last month under a new policy many museums in Beijing became free of charge.

话题46-博物馆.chinese: 参观博物馆可以拓宽我们的视野.
话题46-博物馆.english: Visiting museums could help broaden our horizon.

话题46-博物馆.chinese: 我妈妈过去常在周日带我去博物馆.
话题46-博物馆.english: My mother used to take me to museums on Sundays.

话题46-博物馆.chinese: 故宫里面收藏了大量古董.
话题46-博物馆.english: The Palace Museum has a rich collection of antiques.

话题46-博物馆.chinese: 博物馆经常举办艺术佳作展.
话题46-博物馆.english: Museums often hold exhibitions of great works of art.

话题46-博物馆.chinese: 军事历史博物馆已经成为一个重要的学生教育基地.
话题46-博物馆.english: The Museum of Military History has become an important education base for students.

话题46-博物馆.chinese: 政府应当给与博物馆更多支持.
话题46-博物馆.english: Museums are supposed to be given much support from the government.

话题46-博物馆.chinese: 我去了国家博物馆，并收获颇多.
话题46-博物馆.english: I learned a lot from the trip to the national museum.

话题46-博物馆.chinese: 博物馆是我们获取知识的另外一个场所.
话题46-博物馆.english: The museum is another place for us to gain knowledge.

话题47-交通.chinese: 我最喜欢的交通工具就是打出租车了.
话题47-交通.english: My favorite transportation means is taxi.

话题47-交通.chinese: 我们应该在北京大力发展公共交通.
话题47-交通.english: We should develop public transportation in Beijing.

话题47-交通.chinese: 在北京，太多的私家车导致交通堵塞.
话题47-交通.english: Too many private cars cause traffic jams in Beijing.
Subway is supposed to be on time.

话题47-交通.chinese: 应该鼓励人们乘公交车上班.
话题47-交通.english: People are encouraged to take buses to work.

话题47-交通.chinese: 政府应该采取措施减轻交通压力.
话题47-交通.english: The government should take some measures to relieve the traffic pressure.

话题47-交通.chinese: 因为奥运会在北京召开，政府正在建设更多的地铁.
话题47-交通.english: Since the Olympics will be held in Beijing, the government is building more subways.

话题47-交通.chinese: 飞机是最快速，但也是最昂贵的旅行方式.
话题47-交通.english: Airplane is the quickest but the most expensive way of travelling.

话题47-交通.chinese: 在春节期间，中国铁路系统的载客量面临巨大挑战.
话题47-交通.english: During the Spring Festival, the capacity of China's railway system is highly challenged.
The snow disaster cut off the traffic.

话题47-交通.chinese: 骑自行车旅行既清洁又方便.
话题47-交通.english: The bicycle is a clean and convenient way of traveling.

话题47-交通.chinese: 磁悬浮列车将极大提高运输的速度.
话题47-交通.english: The maglev train will greatly increase the speed of transportation.

话题48-你的国家.chinese: 中国有 23 个省，5 个自治区，4 个直辖市和 2 个持别行政区.
话题48-你的国家.english: China has 23 provinces, 5 autonomous regions, 4 municipalities under the Central Government and two special administration regions.

话题48-你的国家.chinese: 中国幅员 960 万平方公里，为世界第三大国.
话题48-你的国家.english: China is the third largest country in the world with 9,600,000km.
The coastal area is more developed than the Western area.

话题48-你的国家.chinese: 中国的南方经常下雨而北方就干燥得多.
话题48-你的国家.english: It rains a lot in the Southern part of China whereas it is much drier in the North.

话题48-你的国家.chinese: 中国是一个有着 5000 年悠久历史的大国.
话题48-你的国家.english: China is a great country with a long history of over 5, 000 years.

话题48-你的国家.chinese: 中国为世界的和平和昌盛作出了很大的贡献.
话题48-你的国家.english: China has contributed a lot to the world peace and prosperity.

话题48-你的国家.chinese: 中国人以热情好客和勤劳著称.
话题48-你的国家.english: Chinese people are known for their hospitality and industry.

话题48-你的国家.chinese: 中国是旅行的目的地，吸引了世界各地的朋友.
话题48-你的国家.english: China is a tourist destination attracting friends from all over the world.

话题48-你的国家.chinese: 自从改革开放以来，中国发生了翻天覆地的变化.
话题48-你的国家.english: Since the reform and opening up, many great changes have taken place in China.

话题48-你的国家.chinese: 我们因我们光辉灿烂的文化而感到自豪.
话题48-你的国家.english: We are proud of your splendid culture.

话题48-你的国家.chinese: 现在中国在国际社会中享有很高的地位.
话题48-你的国家.english: Now China enjoys a high status in the international community.

话题48-你的国家.chinese: 中国培养了一批闻名世界的科学家和艺术家.
话题48-你的国家.english: China has cultivated a lot of world famous scientists and artists.

话题49-城市.chinese: 北京是中国政治和文化的中心.
话题49-城市.english: Beijing is the political and cultural centre of China.
Beijing has a population of 20 million people.

话题49-城市.chinese: 交通问题已经成为北京日益加剧的一个难题.
话题49-城市.english: Traffic has become an increasingly difficult problem in Beijing.
Beijing is one of Chinese ancient capitals.

话题49-城市.chinese: 北京，800 多年都是中国的首都，有着丰富的文化遗产.
话题49-城市.english: Having been the capital of China for over 800 years, Beijing is a city with rich cultural heritage.

话题49-城市.chinese: 如果有机会，我愿意在杭州生活.
话题49-城市.english: If I had the chance, I would like to live in Hangzhou.

话题49-城市.chinese: 抗州有着温和的气候条件，加上它优美的风景，是理想的居住地.
话题49-城市.english: With a mild climate and its beautiful scenery, Hangzhou is an ideal place for living.

话题49-城市.chinese: 北京的春天经常遭遇沙尘暴的侵袭.
话题49-城市.english: Sand storms often occur in Beijing in spring.

话题49-城市.chinese: 每年各种各样的文化活动和国际专题研讨会都在北京举行.
话题49-城市.english: All kinds of cultural events and international symposiums are held in Beijing every year.

话题49-城市.chinese: 北京是 2008 年奥运会的主办城市.
话题49-城市.english: Beijing acted as the host city for the Olympics in 2008.

话题49-城市.chinese: 北京已经变成一个开放的、现代化的大都市.
话题49-城市.english: Beijing has changed into an open and modern metropolis.

话题49-城市.chinese: 有着数量众多的超市，城市生活越加方便了.
话题49-城市.english: Life in a city with its numerous supermarkets is much more convenient.

话题50-房间.chinese: 我喜欢宽敞、装修到位的房间.
话题50-房间.english: I like a spacious and well furnished room.
My bedroom is sweet and cozy.

话题50-房间.chinese: 我的宿舍很小但是很舒服.
话题50-房间.english: My dorm room is small but comfortable.
A room facing south enjoys good daylight.

话题50-房间.chinese: 住宾馆的时候，我喜欢选择能欣赏风景的房间.
话题50-房间.english: I'd like to have a room with a view while staying in a hotel.

话题50-房间.chinese: 这是一间简单装修的房间，没什么家具.
话题50-房间.english: It is a simply furnished room with little furniture.

话题50-房间.chinese: 如果在我的房间里再添置一个书架，我会更高兴的.
话题50-房间.english: I would be happier if I had another book shelf in my room.

话题50-房间.chinese: 现在人们喜欢住大卧室，卧室配备卫生间的那种.
话题50-房间.english: Nowadays people like to live in a big bedroom with a bathroom attached to it.

话题50-房间.chinese: 我每天都收拾我的小空间.
话题50-房间.english: I tidy my little space every day.

话题50-房间.chinese: 我梦想我的卧室里有一张超大的床.
话题50-房间.english: My dream is to have a king sized bed in my bedroom.

话题50-房间.chinese: 一些绿色植物可以使整个房间充满生机.
话题50-房间.english: Some green plants could liven up the whole room.

话题50-房间.chinese: 墙上的那幅画可以给这个小房间增添不少情调.
话题50-房间.english: The painting on the wall creates some ambience to the little room.

话题51-学校.english: Our school is located in the suburban area.

话题51-学校.chinese: 校园像长满树木、花草的公园.
话题51-学校.english: The school campus is like a park full of trees and flowers.

话题51-学校.chinese: 一条小河穿过校园，增添了不少生活气息.
话题51-学校.english: A river runs through the campus, which adds much life to it.

话题51-学校.chinese: 学校为我们提供了范围宽广的课程.
话题51-学校.english: The school has provided us with a wide range of courses.

话题51-学校.chinese: 学校的校训 (格言) 是让每个学生成功.
话题51-学校.english: The motto of our school is to make every student successful.

话题51-学校.chinese: 我们对母校有深厚的感情.
话题51-学校.english: We hold deep feelings for our old school.

话题51-学校.chinese: 我毕业的学校是我市具有顶尖水平的学校.
话题51-学校.english: The school where I have graduated is a top level school in our city.

话题51-学校.chinese: 学校培养了各个领域的很多人才.
话题51-学校.english: The school has cultivated many talents in all areas.

话题51-学校.chinese: 学校提供多种课外活动.
话题51-学校.english: The school offers a variety of extra curriculum activities.

话题51-学校.chinese: 我很幸运遇到这么多知识渊博、耐心的老师.
话题51-学校.english: It is lucky for me to have encountered many learned and patient teachers.

话题51-学校.chinese: 超过 90% 的毕业生进入大学.
话题51-学校.english: Over 90% of the graduates enter universities.

话题51-学校.chinese: 学校在学习和发展学生技能两个方面同样重视.
话题51-学校.english: The school attaches equal importance to studies and developing their skills.

话题52-建筑.chinese: 9.11 期间，人们目睹了一个年轻人从摩天大楼上跳下 (的情景).
话题52-建筑.english: During 9.11, people witnessed a young man jumping off the skyscraper.

话题52-建筑.chinese: 高速发展的北京建起了越来越多的摩天大楼.
话题52-建筑.english: The fast developing Beijing is building more and more skyscrapers.

话题52-建筑.chinese: 富人们喜欢在他们郊区的别墅中度假.
话题52-建筑.english: The wealthy people enjoy spending their vacation in their villas in the countryside.

话题52-建筑.chinese: 大部分旧时中国的地主都有自己的宽敞的宅第.
话题52-建筑.english: Most of the landlords in old China own a big mansion.

话题52-建筑.chinese: 新建的宾馆显示出很强的设计独创性，这提供了美丽的景色.
话题52-建筑.english: The newly built hotel shows great originality in design, which offers a good view.

话题52-建筑.chinese: 中关村的大部分写字楼都有玻璃外墙.
话题52-建筑.english: Most of the office buildings in Zhongguancun have a glass surface.

话题52-建筑.chinese: 我认为，中国最有趣的建筑是长城，它是世界七大奇迹之一.
话题52-建筑.english: I think in China, the most interesting building is the Great Wall, which is one of the Seven Wonders of the World.

话题52-建筑.chinese: 奥运会的开幕式、闭幕式在” 鸟巢” 举行.
话题52-建筑.english: The opening and closing ceremonies of Olympic Games were held in the Bird Nest.

话题52-建筑.chinese: 它位于国家体育公园的中心.
话题52-建筑.english: It locates in the centre of the national sports park.

话题52-建筑.chinese: 国家剧院已成为这个城市新的象征.
话题52-建筑.english: The National Theatre has become a new symbol of this city.

话题52-建筑.chinese: 它的设计充满关于爱的浪漫和现代观念.
话题52-建筑.english: It's designing is full of romantic and modern idea of love.

话题52-建筑.chinese: 这个纪念碑成为城市的标志和精神支柱.
话题52-建筑.english: This monument has become a landmark and spiritual support of this city.

话题53-外国.chinese: 意大利因其文化成为世界闻名的国家.
话题53-外国.english: Italy is a world famous country for its culture.

话题53-外国.chinese: 意大利人民因其好客为大家所熟知.
话题53-外国.english: The Italian people are well known for their hospitality.

话题53-外国.chinese: 那个国家的人民不但开朗而且热情好客.
话题53-外国.english: People in that country are outgoing and hospitable as well.

话题53-外国.chinese: 在学习之后，我会选择在那里定居.
话题53-外国.english: After my study there, I may choose to settle down there.

话题53-外国.chinese: 这个国家的特别之处就在于她丰富多彩的文化.
话题53-外国.english: What's special about this country is her colorful culture.

话题53-外国.chinese: 这里的价值 (观) 就是独立、成功、平等和个性化.
话题53-外国.english: The values here are independence, success, equality and individuality.

话题53-外国.chinese: 这是一个你能实现梦想的国度.
话题53-外国.english: It is a country where you can realise your dreams.

话题53-外国.chinese: 我从未到过那个国家，但是我读过许多关于它的旅行指南.
话题53-外国.english: I have never been to that country, but I've read a lot of guidebooks about it.

话题53-外国.chinese: 无人能够否定这个国家的教育水平是最好的.
话题53-外国.english: No one denies that the education level in this country is the best.

话题53-外国.chinese: 对你来说，这是一个学习世界上最先进知识的大好机会.
话题53-外国.english: It would be a great opportunity for you to learn the advanced knowledge in the world.

话题53-外国.chinese: 没有一个外国比我的祖国好.
话题53-外国.english: None of the foreign countries is better than my motherland.

话题53-外国.chinese: 当我完成那里的学业，我肯定会回到我的祖国.
话题53-外国.english: I would surely come back to my motherland when I finish my study there.

话题54-河或湖.chinese: 一条小河穿过我们的城镇，将其分为两半.
话题54-河或湖.english: A river runs across our town, which divides it into two parts.

话题54-河或湖.chinese: 长江是中国最长的河流.
话题54-河或湖.english: The Yangtze River is the longest river in China.

话题54-河或湖.chinese: 长江下游的沖积平原是富饶的.
话题54-河或湖.english: The deposited plain at the lower reaches of the Yangtze River is fertile.

话题54-河或湖.chinese: 据说黄河是中华文明的起源.
话题54-河或湖.english: It is said that the Yellow River is the origin of the Chinese culture.

话题54-河或湖.chinese: 西湖是杭州最有名的旅游景点，每年吸引成千上万的游客.
话题54-河或湖.english: The West Lake is the most famous tourist site in Hangzhou, which attracts tens of thousands of tourists every year.

话题54-河或湖.chinese: 夏天，当地居民喜欢在饭后环湖散步.
话题54-河或湖.english: In summer, local people would like to take a stroll around the lake after meal.

话题54-河或湖.chinese: 校园里的天鹅湖是为建校 30 周年而建.
话题54-河或湖.english: The Swan Lake on our campus was built for the thirtieth anniversary.

话题54-河或湖.chinese: 夏天，有些人会沿湖垂钓.
话题54-河或湖.english: Some people would go fishing there around the lake in summer.

话题54-河或湖.chinese: 湖水干净、清澈，湖内有大量的鱼.
话题54-河或湖.english: The water of the lake is clean and clear and there is a great abundance of fish in it.

话题54-河或湖.chinese: 它一年四季有不同的美.
话题54-河或湖.english: It has its own beauty in different seasons of the year.

话题54-河或湖.chinese: 它为这片土地上的人们提供大部分的生活和工业用水.
话题54-河或湖.english: It provides most of the water for people's life and industry on this piece of land.
In summer, it looks like picture of a paradise.

话题55-最喜欢的公园.chinese: 公园应当对每个公民免费开放.
话题55-最喜欢的公园.english: A public park is supposed to be open to every citizen and free of charge.

话题55-最喜欢的公园.chinese: 每天早上你可以看到许多人在公园锻炼身体.
话题55-最喜欢的公园.english: Every morning you can see a lot of people exercising in the park.

话题55-最喜欢的公园.chinese: 每天，我在上学的路上路过这个公园.
话题55-最喜欢的公园.english: I pass by the park every day on my way to school.

话题55-最喜欢的公园.chinese: 晚饭后在公园散步有益健康.
话题55-最喜欢的公园.english: Taking a walk in the park after dinner is good for health.

话题55-最喜欢的公园.chinese: 公园里优美的风景有时能激发我们的灵感.
话题55-最喜欢的公园.english: The beautiful sceneries in the park sometimes stimulate our inspiration.

话题55-最喜欢的公园.chinese: 花园和公园 (的点缀) 使这个城市更加漂亮.
话题55-最喜欢的公园.english: Gardens and parks have made the city more beautiful.

话题55-最喜欢的公园.chinese: 森林公园看上去像一张明信片.
话题55-最喜欢的公园.english: The forest park looks like a post card.

话题55-最喜欢的公园.chinese: 那里的日落的确是激动人心的景观.
话题55-最喜欢的公园.english: The view of the sunset there is truly breathtaking.

话题55-最喜欢的公园.chinese: 在公园里慢跑可以使你精神焕发.
话题55-最喜欢的公园.english: Jogging in the park peps you up.

话题55-最喜欢的公园.chinese: 捷足先登 (早起的鸟儿先吃虫).
话题55-最喜欢的公园.english: The early bird catches the worm.

话题55-最喜欢的公园.chinese: 如果城市拥有更多的像公园和花园之类的公共设施 (地方), 那就更好了.
话题55-最喜欢的公园.english: It would be better if the city has more public places, like parks and gardens.

话题55-最喜欢的公园.chinese: 我喜欢去游乐园，譬如北京的” 欢乐谷”.
话题55-最喜欢的公园.english: I prefer to go to an amusement park, like "Happy Valley" in Beijing.

话题56-图书馆.chinese: 我们校园内有一个大的图书馆，藏书数百万卷.
话题56-图书馆.english: There is a big library on my campus with millions of books in it.

话题56-图书馆.chinese: 大多数的学生都到图书馆里来学习，因为这里有一个祥和的学术环境.
话题56-图书馆.english: Most students study in library because it provides a peaceful academic atmosphere.

话题56-图书馆.chinese: 我常到图书馆里借阅一些有关创造力的书籍.
话题56-图书馆.english: I often borrow some books about creativity from the library.

话题56-图书馆.chinese: 图书馆是各个学科信息的充足资源.
话题56-图书馆.english: Library is an abundant resource of information on all subjects.

话题56-图书馆.chinese: 我希望将来图书馆能够向全体市民开放.
话题56-图书馆.english: I hope in future the library could be open to public citizens.

话题56-图书馆.chinese: 当我写作论文和散文时，我常借助 (参阅) 图书管里的书籍.
话题56-图书馆.english: When I am writing papers or essays, I will turn to those academic books in library.

话题56-图书馆.chinese: 现在学校向我们提供电子书籍可借阅.
话题56-图书馆.english: Now the school is providing e-books for us to borrow.

话题56-图书馆.chinese: 网络图书馆方便我们查找书籍.
话题56-图书馆.english: An online library is convenient for us to search for books.

话题56-图书馆.chinese: 一个图书馆就像一本大百科全书.
话题56-图书馆.english: A library is like an encyclopedia.

话题56-图书馆.chinese: 有些学生在图书馆里大声说话，这给我很大烦恼.
话题56-图书馆.english: Some students speak loudly in the library, which annoys me a lot.

话题56-图书馆.chinese: 如果你要借书，就要有一个图书馆借书证.
话题56-图书馆.english: A library card is needed if you want to borrow books.

话题56-图书馆.chinese: 国家图书馆对生活各个层面的书籍都拥有广泛而全面的收集.
话题56-图书馆.english: The national library has a vast and comprehensive collection of books in all walks of life.

话题57-媒体.chinese: 我每天晚上都在网上读新闻.
话题57-媒体.english: I read news online every evening.

话题57-媒体.chinese: 看电视是我们了解世界动态的最便捷方式.
话题57-媒体.english: Watching TV is the easiest way to get to know what happens around the world.

话题57-媒体.chinese: 亙联网上有很多错误信息.
话题57-媒体.english: There is much false information on the Internet.

话题57-媒体.chinese: 媒体工作者最重要的任务是追寻事件背后的真相.
话题57-媒体.english: The preeminent objective of a media worker is to pursue the truth behind the event.

话题57-媒体.chinese: 我们不应该百分之百地相信电视报道.
话题57-媒体.english: We should not 100% believe what is reported on TV.

话题57-媒体.chinese: 收听美国之音是学习英语的好方法.
话题57-媒体.english: Listening to VOA news is a good way of learning English.

话题57-媒体.chinese: 有时候媒体只是某些利益集团的传话筒.
话题57-媒体.english: Sometimes media are the only mouthpiece of certain interest groups.

话题57-媒体.chinese: 恐怖主义者利用媒体传播他们的信息.
话题57-媒体.english: Terrorists take advantage of the media to spread their messages.

话题57-媒体.chinese: 互联网的发展超越了媒体的范畴.
话题57-媒体.english: The development of the Internet extends the scope of media.

话题57-媒体.chinese: 作为现代年轻人，我们既要关注本地新闻也要关注国家新闻.
话题57-媒体.english: As a modern young man, we should pay attention to both local news and national news.

话题57-媒体.chinese: 媒体负有监督政府机关工作的职责.
话题57-媒体.english: The media should shoulder the responsibility of supervising the work of the government.

话题57-媒体.chinese: 现在很多人遇到困难时求助于媒体.
话题57-媒体.english: Nowadays many people turn to media for help when they are in trouble.

话题58-电视.chinese: 我是一个十足的电视迷.
话题58-电视.english: I am a big fan of TV.

话题58-电视.chinese: 坐得离电视太近会伤害你的眼睛.
话题58-电视.english: Sitting too close to the TV can ruin your eyes.

话题58-电视.chinese: 孩子们不应该熬夜看电视.
话题58-电视.english: Children should not stay up too late watching TV.

话题58-电视.chinese: 在我空闲时间里，我喜欢看肥皂剧.
话题58-电视.english: In my spare time I like watching soap operas.

话题58-电视.chinese: 我不喜欢看广告，因为它们把电视节目拆开了.
话题58-电视.english: I don't like commercials because they chop up programs into pieces.

话题58-电视.chinese: 现在好多电视节目都是垃圾.
话题58-电视.english: Nowadays many TV programs are rubbish.

话题58-电视.chinese: 电视迷是指那些终日盯着电视看的人.
话题58-电视.english: Couch potato is used to describe those who spend the whole day watching TV.

话题58-电视.chinese: 好多人因为整日坐在电视前吃零食而长胖了.
话题58-电视.english: Many people gain weight by sitting before TV and eating snacks for all day.

话题58-电视.chinese: 我们可以通过电视看奥运会直播.
话题58-电视.english: We can watch the Olympic Games live on TV.

话题58-电视.chinese: 在中国，几乎每家都有一台或更多电视机.
话题58-电视.english: Almost every family in China has one or more TV sets.

话题58-电视.chinese: 通过电视，我们可以了解到在世界的其他角落人们都在做什么.
话题58-电视.english: Through TV we get to know what people do in other corners of the world.

话题58-电视.chinese: 有些人认为看电视是浪费时间.
话题58-电视.english: Some people think watching TV is a waste of time.

话题59-广告.chinese: 广告的目的是招徕更多生意.
话题59-广告.english: Advertisements aim to drum up more business.

话题59-广告.chinese: 有时广告的伎俩可以吸引消费者.
话题59-广告.english: Sometimes, advertisement gimmicks can attract customers.

话题59-广告.chinese: 精心设计的广告使生意兴隆.
话题59-广告.english: A well-designed advertisement gets business going.

话题59-广告.chinese: 网络的发展使广告的形式多样化.
话题59-广告.english: The development of the Internet has brought about many new forms of advertising.

话题59-广告.chinese: 电视节目中的广告让人生厌.
话题59-广告.english: Commercials on TV programs are annoying.

话题59-广告.chinese: 报纸、电视和其他形式的媒体，收益都依靠广告.
话题59-广告.english: The revenue of newspapers, TV stations and other forms of media rely on advertisements.

话题59-广告.chinese: 我们总是可以在时尚杂志上看见奢侈品广告.
话题59-广告.english: We can always see advertisements for luxuries in fashion magazines.

话题59-广告.chinese: 好的电视广告是一种艺术.
话题59-广告.english: A good TV commercial is a work of art.

话题59-广告.chinese: 大的品牌在广告上投资很多.
话题59-广告.english: Big brands invest a lot of money in advertising.

话题59-广告.chinese: 广告影响我们的消费习惯.

话题60-报纸或杂志.chinese: 我每天通过阅读报纸来获悉世界上发生的事情.
话题60-报纸或杂志.english: I read newspapers every day to be informed of what is happening in the world.

话题60-报纸或杂志.chinese: 有关互联网或科学的杂志是我的最爱.
话题60-报纸或杂志.english: Magazines about the Internet or science are my favorite.

话题60-报纸或杂志.chinese: 并不是报纸上所有的信息都是精 (确) 准 (确) 的.
话题60-报纸或杂志.english: Not all of the information in newspapers is accurate or correct.

话题60-报纸或杂志.chinese: 读报可以拓宽我们的视野.
话题60-报纸或杂志.english: Reading newspapers could broaden our horizon.

话题60-报纸或杂志.chinese: 对许多人来说，报纸是获得最新消息不可或缺的方式.
话题60-报纸或杂志.english: For some people, newspaper is an indispensable way to gain the latest information.

话题60-报纸或杂志.chinese: 有种类繁多的杂志来满足不同品味 (人的需要).
话题60-报纸或杂志.english: There are a great variety of magazines for different tastes.

话题60-报纸或杂志.chinese: 报纸非常轻便，便于携带.
话题60-报纸或杂志.english: Newspaper is portable and it is easy to carry with.

话题60-报纸或杂志.chinese: 相较于报纸而言，电视新闻能够给我们留下更深刻的印象.
话题60-报纸或杂志.english: News on TV could leave us a deeper impression, compared with newspapers.

话题60-报纸或杂志.chinese: 新闻工作者在报道的时候应该忠于事实.
话题60-报纸或杂志.english: A journalist is supposed to tell the truth while reporting.
Some newspapers are tended to be local.

话题60-报纸或杂志.chinese: 我只阅读我感兴趣的东西.
话题60-报纸或杂志.english: I only read what I am interested in.

话题60-报纸或杂志.chinese: 英文报纸有助于我们学习英语.
话题60-报纸或杂志.english: English newspapers could help us learn English.

话题61-因特网.chinese: 从长远看，网上购物越来越受欢迎.
话题61-因特网.english: From a long-term perspective, internet shopping is getting more and more popular.

话题61-因特网.chinese: 终究有些物品不适用于网上购买.
话题61-因特网.english: After all, some goods are not suitable for online shopping.

话题61-因特网.chinese: 对于有些女孩，她们更喜欢去百货商店而不是网上购物.
话题61-因特网.english: For some girls, they prefer to go to department stores instead of online shopping.

话题61-因特网.chinese: 电子商务正在改变现代贸易方式.
话题61-因特网.english: E-commerce is changing the way of modern trade.

话题61-因特网.chinese: 电子银行很方便，我们可以自己在网上转账.
话题61-因特网.english: E-bank is so convenient that we can transfer money online by ourselves.

话题61-因特网.chinese: 随着科技的突飞猛进，远程教育开始兴旺起来.
话题61-因特网.english: Distance education is booming as technology is making astounding advances.

话题61-因特网.chinese: 我担心电子邮件将削弱人们书写和人际交往的技能.
话题61-因特网.english: I am worrying that e-mail will reduce writing and interpersonal skills.

话题61-因特网.chinese: 交互式课本比传统课本有很多优点.
话题61-因特网.english: The interactive book, or the i-book will offer many advantages over traditional books.

话题61-因特网.chinese: 更多的详细信息可以通过鼠标点击和触摸而获得.
话题61-因特网.english: More detailed information will be just a click or touch away.

话题61-因特网.chinese: 作为新的媒体，因特网提供了大量的信息.
话题61-因特网.english: As a new media, the Internet is providing a great abundance of information.

话题61-因特网.chinese: 因特网让世界变成了一个地球村.
话题61-因特网.english: The Internet has made the world a global village.

话题61-因特网.chinese: 在网上不要泄露您的个人信息，例如电话号码和生日.
话题61-因特网.english: Never let out your personal information online, such as phone numbers and birthday.

话题62-电视节目.chinese: 我只看电视的新闻节目.
话题62-电视节目.english: I only watch news programs on TV.

话题62-电视节目.chinese: 电视在现代生活中起着积极的作用，并且已经成为我们生活不可或缺的一部分.
话题62-电视节目.english: TV is playing a positive role in our modern life and it has become a part of our life.

话题62-电视节目.chinese: 脱口秀是我最喜欢的节目，因为它们讲的都是真实的故事.
话题62-电视节目.english: Talk show programs are my favorite because they are telling real stories.

话题62-电视节目.chinese: 在看电视这个问题上，家长应该引导孩子.
