话题62-电视节目.english: Parents should guide their children when watching TV.

话题62-电视节目.chinese: 有些节目中包含性、暴力和粗鲁的语言.
话题62-电视节目.english: Some programs contain sex, violence and raw languages.

话题62-电视节目.chinese: 足球频道受到年轻人特别是年轻男人的青睐.
话题62-电视节目.english: Football channel is popular among young people, particularly men.

话题62-电视节目.chinese: 我现在感兴趣的是与这届奥运会相关的电视节目.
话题62-电视节目.english: Now I am interested in programs about this great Olympic Games.

话题62-电视节目.chinese: 探索发现节目可以拓宽我们的视野.
话题62-电视节目.english: Programs about adventures and discoveries could broaden our horizon.

话题62-电视节目.chinese: 和家人一起看电视给我们提供了一种沟通的机会.
话题62-电视节目.english: Watching TV together with family members is an opportunity to communicate.

话题62-电视节目.chinese: 在我看来，在电视机前待太长时间是浪费时间.
话题62-电视节目.english: As far as I am concerned, too much time in front of TV is a waste of time.

话题62-电视节目.chinese: 在某种程度上，电视可以说是一本百科全书.
话题62-电视节目.english: TV, to some extent, can be regarded as an encyclopedia.

话题63-动物或宠物.chinese: 宠物能与人为伴，并带给人许多乐趣.
话题63-动物或宠物.english: A pet provides companionship to people and brings them a lot of fun.

话题63-动物或宠物.chinese: 守规矩的宠物是家庭可爱的一员.
话题63-动物或宠物.english: A well-behaved pet is a beloved member of a family.
Some people keep snakes as pets.

话题63-动物或宠物.chinese: 猫是如此逗人喜爱以致我为它们疯狂.
话题63-动物或宠物.english: I am crazy about cats, because they are so cute.

话题63-动物或宠物.chinese: 猫因为它们的优雅和神秘而常常受到赞美.
话题63-动物或宠物.english: Cats are often admired for their grace and mysteriousness.

话题63-动物或宠物.chinese: 狗很忠诚，从不背叛它们的主人.
话题63-动物或宠物.english: Dogs are loyal and never forsake their master.

话题63-动物或宠物.chinese: 养宠物，你得有爱心和负责任.
话题63-动物或宠物.english: To keep a pet, you shall be loving and committed.

话题63-动物或宠物.chinese: 每天晚上我都带狗去散步.
话题63-动物或宠物.english: I take my dog on walks every evening.

话题63-动物或宠物.chinese: 遗弃 (你的) 宠物是可耻的事情.
话题63-动物或宠物.english: It's a shame to abandon your pet.

话题63-动物或宠物.chinese: 饲养宠物包括很多的责任和工作.
话题63-动物或宠物.english: Keeping a pet involves a lot of responsibility and work.

话题63-动物或宠物.chinese: 学习照顾宠物能有助于 (培养) 孩子的责任感.
话题63-动物或宠物.english: Learning to care for a pet helps a child to have a sense of responsibility.
I enjoy spending time with my cat.

话题64-野生动物.chinese: 政府应该制定相关法律保护野生动物.
话题64-野生动物.english: The government should lay down relative laws to protect wild animals.

话题64-野生动物.chinese: 野生动物在生态系统中具有重要作用.
话题64-野生动物.english: Wild animals play an important role in the eco-system.

话题64-野生动物.chinese: 非法捕杀野生动物的人应该受到惩罚.
话题64-野生动物.english: Those who illegally hunt wild animals should be punished.

话题64-野生动物.chinese: 一些野生动物已不能适应现在的环境.
话题64-野生动物.english: Some wild animals just can't adapt to the environment today.

话题64-野生动物.chinese: 动物园里的野生动物过于驯服，在某种程度上是不利的.
话题64-野生动物.english: The wild lives in the zoo are too tame, which, in a way, is not good.

话题64-野生动物.chinese: 看到野生动物在它们的自然栖息地自由奔跑，我感到十分愉快.
话题64-野生动物.english: I enjoy seeing wild animals running free in their natural habitats.

话题64-野生动物.chinese: 野生动物不应囚禁在动物园的笼子中.
话题64-野生动物.english: Wild animals should not be caged in the zoo.

话题64-野生动物.chinese: 把动物圈养起来有点残忍.
话题64-野生动物.english: It is kind of animal cruelty if we raise them in a cage.

话题64-野生动物.chinese: 作为森林之王，你要尊重所有的生命，从爬行的蚂蚁到奔跑的羚羊 (或：跳跃的羚羊). (摘自 < 狮子王 >)
话题64-野生动物.english: As a king, you need to respect all the creatures from the crawling ant to the leaping antelope, (from LION KING)

话题64-野生动物.chinese: 动物是我们人类的朋友，应该受到平等对待.
话题64-野生动物.english: Animals are friends to us human beings and should be treated equally.

话题64-野生动物.chinese: 一些野生动物濒临灭绝，比如熊猫和老虎.
话题64-野生动物.english: Some wild animals are on the brink of extinction, for example, panda and tiger.

话题64-野生动物.chinese: 是我们采取措施保护野生动物的时候了.
话题64-野生动物.english: It is high time that we took some measures to protect the wild animals.

话题65-气候.chinese: 在中国的北方，四季分明.
话题65-气候.english: In the north of China, the four seasons are distinguishable.

话题65-气候.chinese: 我最喜欢夏天，因为夏天百花齐放.
话题65-气候.english: I like summer best because flowers bloom luxuriously.

话题65-气候.chinese: 有了盛开的花朵，夏天带给我们的是多彩斑斓的世界.
话题65-气候.english: With the blooming flowers, summer provides us with a colorful decoration.

话题65-气候.chinese: 我特别喜欢春天，因为它是一年的开始.
话题65-气候.english: Spring is my favorite season because it is the beginning of a year.

话题65-气候.chinese: 春天是一个充满生机的季节，在春天里你可以看到树木在一夜之间变成绿色.
话题65-气候.english: Spring is a season full of energy, in which you can see trees turn green overnight.

话题65-气候.chinese: 对于农民，秋天是一个收获的季节.
话题65-气候.english: Autumn is a harvest season for farmers.

话题65-气候.chinese: 在我的家乡，冬天是冰雪的季节，那里每天天气都很冷.
话题65-气候.english: In my hometown, winter is a season of snow and it's freezing every day.

话题65-气候.chinese: 现在的气候比以前糟了很多.
话题65-气候.english: The climate at present is much worse than before.

话题65-气候.chinese: 在近几年里，我所在的城市环境发生了巨大的变化.
话题65-气候.english: Great changes of environment have taken place during the recent years in my city.

话题65-气候.chinese: 工厂排放的废气和汽车排出的尾气对我们的环境是巨大的威胁.
话题65-气候.english: The exhaust gas from factories and cars is a great threat to our environment.

话题65-气候.chinese: 夏天的气温一年比一年升高.
话题65-气候.english: The temperature in summer every year is getting higher and higher.

话题65-气候.chinese: 在秋天，当天气好的时候，人们经常去爬山.
话题65-气候.english: In autumn, when the weather is fine, people in my hometown often climb hills.

话题66-工业.chinese: 工业的发展给环境带来了污染.
话题66-工业.english: The development of industry brings about much pollution to the environment.
Industry is the greatest source of pollution.

话题66-工业.chinese: 煤炭和陶瓷工业是我家乡的支柱产业.
话题66-工业.english: The mainstay in my hometown is coal and ceramics industry.

话题66-工业.chinese: 生产型工厂用大量的净水沖走各种废弃物.
话题66-工业.english: Manufacturing facilities use huge quantities of freshwater to carry wastes of many kinds.

话题66-工业.chinese: 大多数国家意识到了全球变暖的问题.
话题66-工业.english: Most countries have realised the problem of global warming.

话题66-工业.chinese: 化学工业的科技发展改变了世界的经济.
话题66-工业.english: Technological advances in the chemical industry have altered the world's economy.

话题66-工业.chinese: 消费者电子工业发展得比以前快很多.
话题66-工业.english: The consumer electronics industry is developing much more quickly than before.

话题66-工业.chinese: 政府应该出面平衡经济发展与环境保护的问题.
话题66-工业.english: The government should try to keep the balance of development and environmental protection.

话题66-工业.chinese: 我们不能为了保护环境而停止工业化的进程.
话题66-工业.english: We cannot stop industrialisation to protect the environment.

话题66-工业.chinese: 工业应为那些最致命的污染物负责.
话题66-工业.english: Industry is responsible for the most deadly pollutants.

话题66-工业.chinese: 污染灭绝了一些动植物物种，甚至危害到了我们人类.
话题66-工业.english: Pollution is killing off some plant and animal species, and even our human beings.

话题66-工业.chinese: 在很多公共用水系统中，水污染已经超过了安全标准.
话题66-工业.english: In many public water systems, pollution exceeds safe levels.

话题67-污染.chinese: 没有人乐意看见地上到处都是垃圾.
话题67-污染.english: Nobody would like to see trash all over the ground.

话题67-污染.chinese: 当你在户外吃喝的时候，你应该将垃圾保存下来，直到你看见垃圾桶再放进去.
话题67-污染.english: When drinking or eating outside, you should keep the garbage until you find a trash can to put it in.

话题67-污染.chinese: 乱扔垃圾使我们的星球很脏.
我们不应该浪费纸张，因为纸张是用砍伐的树木造的.
话题67-污染.english: We shouldn't waste paper because trees are being cut down to make the paper.

话题67-污染.chinese: 超市和商店曾免费供应的塑料袋现在被禁止了.
话题67-污染.english: Free plastic bags once provided by the supermarkets and stores are now forbidden.

话题67-污染.chinese: 我们应该建设更多的回收中心.
话题67-污染.english: More recycling centres are supposed to be set up.

话题67-污染.chinese: 加工制造业应遵守环保的规定和条例.
话题67-污染.english: Manufacturing plants should abide by the rules and regulations for environmental protection.

话题67-污染.chinese: 纺织、炼钢业比其他工业产生更多的污染物.
话题67-污染.english: Textile and steel industries produce more pollutants than others.

话题67-污染.chinese: 如果河流污染，人们将来会无水可喝.
话题67-污染.english: If the rivers and lakes are polluted, people would not have water to drink in future.

话题67-污染.chinese: 现在大多数人意识到水污染的严重性.
话题67-污染.english: Now most people are aware of the seriousness of water pollution.

话题67-污染.chinese: 汽车和公交车是最大的空气污染气体排放源.
话题67-污染.english: Cars and public buses are producing most of the exhaust gas to the air.

话题67-污染.chinese: 新能源的研究将会提供一个解决问题的更好途径.
话题67-污染.english: Study on new energies may provide a better way to solve the problem.

话题68-科学发展.chinese: 受科技的推动，社会正经历一场戏剧性的变革.
话题68-科学发展.english: Driven by science and technology, the society is undergoing a dramatic change.

话题68-科学发展.chinese: 我对科学的迷恋始于中学时期.
话题68-科学发展.english: My fascination with science started from middle school.

话题68-科学发展.chinese: 我们希望科学通过一种生动的方式介绍给公众.
话题68-科学发展.english: We hope that science is introduced to the public in a vivid way.

话题68-科学发展.chinese: 科技在某种程度上代表了一个国家的实力.
话题68-科学发展.english: Science and technology, to some extent, represents the power of a country.

话题68-科学发展.chinese: 我们即将进入一个自动化的时代.
话题68-科学发展.english: We are coming to an age of automation.

话题68-科学发展.chinese: 科学并不是我们想象中的那么抽象.
话题68-科学发展.english: Science is not as abstract as what you have expected.

话题68-科学发展.chinese: 科学的发展推动了其他工业的发展.
话题68-科学发展.english: The development of science is pushing forward the development of other industries.

话题68-科学发展.chinese: 技术正使世界变得丰富多彩，不可预测.
话题68-科学发展.english: Technology is making the world colorful and unexpected as well.

话题68-科学发展.chinese: 电子技术发展得如此之快以至于我们每天可以看到新的电子产品.
话题68-科学发展.english: Electronic technology is developing so fast that we see new e-products every day.
Science and technology is the first productive force.

话题68-科学发展.chinese: 经过多年研究，他弄清了真相.
话题68-科学发展.english: With many years of study and research, he found out the truth.

话题68-科学发展.chinese: 以相对论闻名的爱因斯坦是我最钦佩的科学家之一.
话题68-科学发展.english: Einstein, famous for his theory of relativity, is one of the scientists I admire most.

话题69-假期.chinese: 如果你有烦恼，假期是最好的药物.
话题69-假期.english: When you are troubled, a vacation is the best medicine.

话题69-假期.chinese: 去年夏天，我在苏州有过快乐的停留.
话题69-假期.english: Last summer, I had a blissful stay in Suzhou.

话题69-假期.chinese: 如果我有几天的假期，我会游玩杭州.
话题69-假期.english: If I had a holiday of a few days, I'd like to visit Hangzhou.

话题69-假期.chinese: 我通常在 7 月和 4 月度长假.
话题69-假期.english: I always take a long holiday in July and April.

话题69-假期.chinese: 我的假期都是闲逛并在无所事事中度过.
话题69-假期.english: I spend my holiday fooling around and doing nothing.

话题69-假期.chinese: 东京是度假的理想目的地.
话题69-假期.english: Tokyo is an ideal destination for holidays.

话题69-假期.chinese: 巴黎因其浪漫的环境 (气氛) 成为旅游胜地.
话题69-假期.english: With its romantic atmosphere, Paris becomes a tourist attraction.

话题69-假期.chinese: 夏天我的北京之旅很有魅力.
话题69-假期.english: My trip to Beijing in the summer holiday was charming.

话题69-假期.chinese: 春节是中国最重要的节曰.
话题69-假期.english: Spring festival is the most important holiday in China.

话题69-假期.chinese: 假日里，我经常和家人举行大的聚会.
话题69-假期.english: During holidays, I often have a big gathering with our family members.

话题69-假期.chinese: 春节期间，我会给我的亲戚拜年.
话题69-假期.english: I would pay a New Year visit to my relatives during the Spring Festival.

话题69-假期.chinese: 假日里，我喜欢到体操中心健身.
话题69-假期.english: I would prefer to go to the gym centre to do the body exercising on holidays.

话题70-工作.chinese: 现在，我在一家本地广告公司工作.
话题70-工作.english: Presently, I'm working for a local advertising company.

话题70-工作.chinese: 我靠设计电视商业广告过活.
话题70-工作.english: I make a living by designing TV commercials.

话题70-工作.chinese: 我理想的工作是一份每年至少有两个星期帶薪假期的工作.
话题70-工作.english: My ideal job should have at least two weeks' paid vacation every year.

话题70-工作.chinese: 在目前看来，这个工作的前景是严酷的.
话题70-工作.english: At present, the job outlook is grim.

话题70-工作.chinese: 我的梦想就是找一个高薪水的工作，比如银行、市场营销等.
话题70-工作.english: My dream is to find a well-paid job, such as banking, marketing, etc.

话题70-工作.chinese: 我希望去一家跨国公司上班.
话题70-工作.english: I hope to work in a multinational company.

话题70-工作.chinese: 我极度喜欢会计和金融.
话题70-工作.english: I am fascinated with accounting and finance.

话题70-工作.chinese: 我对目前的工作不是很满意.
话题70-工作.english: I am not very satisfied with my present job.

话题70-工作.chinese: 我想换掉我目前的工作.
话题70-工作.english: I wish to switch my current job.

话题70-工作.chinese: 现如今，招聘市场充满着激烈的竞争.
话题70-工作.english: Nowadays, the job market is full of fierce competition.

话题70-工作.chinese: 我相信凭我的天赋应能找到一个更高职位的工作.
话题70-工作.english: I believe my talents merit a higher position.

话题70-工作.chinese: 现今，年轻人往往眼高手低.
话题70-工作.english: Nowadays young people tend to think themselves above business.

话题71-保持健康.chinese: 为了健康我每天都慢跑.
话题71-保持健康.english: I do jogging everyday in order to keep fit.

话题71-保持健康.chinese: 特技飞行有助于人们健康.
话题71-保持健康.english: Aerobics can help people keep fit.

话题71-保持健康.chinese: 瑜伽功在中国女士中很受欢迎.
话题71-保持健康.english: Yoga is very popular among women in China.

话题71-保持健康.chinese: 我们应劳逸结合 (保持工作与休息平衡).
话题71-保持健康.english: We should keep balance of work and rest.

话题71-保持健康.chinese: 经常锻炼身体使我的思维敏捷.
话题71-保持健康.english: Doing exercises regularly helps me keep my mind alert.

话题71-保持健康.chinese: 在中国打太极拳是保健的一种特殊方式.
话题71-保持健康.english: Practicing TaiQi is a special way of keeping fit in China.

话题71-保持健康.chinese: 在社区公园我们可以自由使用许多运动设施.
话题71-保持健康.english: We have free access to many exercise facilities in the community garden.

话题71-保持健康.chinese: 我们饭后不应做剧烈运动.
话题71-保持健康.english: We should not do vigorous exercises right after meal.

话题71-保持健康.chinese: 建议老人做一些室内运动.
话题71-保持健康.english: Old people are suggested to do some gentle indoor exercises.

话题71-保持健康.chinese: 锻炼不当对 (身体) 健康不利.
话题71-保持健康.english: Doing exercises in a wrong way could bring harm to our health.

话题71-保持健康.chinese: 最近，健身俱乐部如雨后春笋般地出现.
话题71-保持健康.english: Lately health clubs spring up like bamboo shoots after a spring rain.

话题71-保持健康.chinese: 生活在农村的人们很难见到 (获得) 运动器械 (设施).
话题71-保持健康.english: People living in the rural areas have difficulties in getting access to exercise facilities.

话题72-理想.chinese: 当我还是十几岁的时候，我就梦想成为一名记者.
话题72-理想.english: When I was a teenager, I dreamed to be a journalist.

话题72-理想.chinese: 就我本人而言，我可以丰富自己并从中受益.
话题72-理想.english: As far as I'm concerned, I can enrich myself and benefit from it.

话题72-理想.chinese: 当我有些迷茫时，树立信心会将我从挫折中拯救出来.
话题72-理想.english: When I'm kind of at a loss, to have an ambition will save me from being frustrated.

话题72-理想.chinese: 我阅读了有关它的大量书籍，并参加了各种各样的活动.
话题72-理想.english: I've read heaps of books about it and have taken part in varieties of activities.

话题72-理想.chinese: 我经常平静地坐下，一遍又一遍地考虑这个问题.
话题72-理想.english: I usually sit down peacefully, and think about this problem over and over again.

话题72-理想.chinese: 我有时请教我的一位好友，从他那儿得到一些建议.
话题72-理想.english: I sometimes consult one of my best friends and get some advice from him.

话题72-理想.chinese: 我会对着镜子里的自己微笑，并告诉自己我会成功.
话题72-理想.english: I will smile to myself in the mirror and tell me that I can make it!

话题72-理想.chinese: 我想我还有机会来纠正自己的错误，因为无人生来就十全十美.
话题72-理想.english: I think I have a second chance to correct the mistake because nobody was born perfect.

话题72-理想.chinese: 在绝望之山开采出希望之石.
话题72-理想.english: Hew out of the mountain of despair a stone of hope.

话题72-理想.chinese: — 旦有了计划，就要坚持 (下去), 最终你会成功的.
话题72-理想.english: Once you have a plan and stick to it, then can make it.

话题72-理想.chinese: 困难之中总会见到光明的 (每片云彩都有银色的边缘).
话题72-理想.english: Every cloud has a silver lining.

话题72-理想.chinese: 只要你相信，奇迹就能出现.
话题72-理想.english: There can be miracles when you believe.

话题73-在线教育.chinese: 网上学习能提供灵活的学习机会.
话题73-在线教育.english: Online learning could provide flexible learning opportunities.

话题73-在线教育.chinese: 网上学习能够节省我们的时间、精力和金钱.
话题73-在线教育.english: Studying online will save us time / energy and money.

话题73-在线教育.chinese: 如果有一台个人电脑或便携式电脑，人们能在任何他们想要的地方学习.
话题73-在线教育.english: People can study anywhere they want if they have a PC or laptop at hand.

话题73-在线教育.chinese: 人们会降低同他人沟通的能力.
话题73-在线教育.english: People may lose their ability of communicating with others.

话题73-在线教育.chinese: 因特网为网上课程提供了多种选择.
话题73-在线教育.english: The Internet has provided a great variety of choices for online courses.

话题73-在线教育.chinese: 今后，我们得到网上教育的学历是相当容易的.
话题73-在线教育.english: In future, it would be quite easy for us to get a degree of online college education.

话题73-在线教育.chinese: 网络虚拟学校并不一定会节约多少运营成本.
话题73-在线教育.english: Virtual schools may not save much in operating costs.

话题73-在线教育.chinese: 教育学院需要为实体的和虚拟的课堂培训更多的老师.
话题73-在线教育.english: Schools of education need to train more teachers to work in both physical and virtual classrooms.

话题73-在线教育.chinese: 网上学校学生比传统学习者表现水平差一些.
话题73-在线教育.english: Online school students perform at a lower level than traditional learners.

话题73-在线教育.chinese: 如果你想要上他们的网上课程，“一对一” 老师将为你安排时间.
话题73-在线教育.english: One on One teacher will schedule time for you if you want to take an online class with them.

话题73-在线教育.chinese: 你和老师之间根本没有相互交流.
话题73-在线教育.english: There is no mutual communication at all between you and your teacher.

话题73-在线教育.chinese: 无论如何，我更喜欢在教室与老师面对面地学习.
话题73-在线教育.english: Anyhow, I would prefer to study face to face with the teacher in the classroom.

话题74-时髦的专业.chinese: 我在清华大学读土木工程.
话题74-时髦的专业.english: I am studying civil engineering in Tsinghua University.

话题74-时髦的专业.chinese: 我所就读的这所大学，就这个专业而言，是享誉世界的.
话题74-时髦的专业.english: This major in my university is world famous.

话题74-时髦的专业.chinese: 那些公式和程序代码让我感到头晕.
话题74-时髦的专业.english: I'm getting dizzy about the equations and the programmed codes.

话题74-时髦的专业.chinese: 通过我的专业我学到的最重要的知识是计划的方法.
话题74-时髦的专业.english: The most important knowledge I learnt from my major is the way of planning.

话题74-时髦的专业.chinese: 这不像我原来想象的那么简单.
话题74-时髦的专业.english: It is not as easy as what I have expected before.

话题74-时髦的专业.chinese: 我每天需要面对的是各种各样的生产化妆品用的原材料.
话题74-时髦的专业.english: What I should face to everyday are kinds of raw material for cosmetics.

话题74-时髦的专业.chinese: 如果我对这个专业感兴趣，我会全力以赴的.
话题74-时髦的专业.english: If I am interested in the major, I would be deeply devoted to it.

话题74-时髦的专业.chinese: 如果我的评分够高，我就可以找到一份薪水可观的体面的工作了.
话题74-时髦的专业.english: If my score is high, I could easily find a decent job with a decent payment.

话题74-时髦的专业.chinese: 传媒和新闻这类专业在中国越来越受欢迎了.
话题74-时髦的专业.english: Majors like communication and journalism are getting more popular in China.

话题74-时髦的专业.chinese: 我知道自己的兴趣所在，但我还是经常会听取我的父母的一些建议.
话题74-时髦的专业.english: I know what I am interested in, but I often turn to my parents for some advice.

话题74-时髦的专业.chinese: 一些高中生在选择专业的时候有点沖动.
话题74-时髦的专业.english: Some high school students are kind of impulsive when declaring majors.

话题74-时髦的专业.chinese: 如果选择了适合的专业，你就更容易走向成功.
话题74-时髦的专业.english: You would be more easily to be successful if you could choose an appropriate major.

话题75-压力.chinese: 现代社会竞争越来越激烈.
话题75-压力.english: Nowadays social competition becomes more and more fierce.
People always want to keep up with the Joneses.

话题75-压力.chinese: 我们生活在一个快节奏的社会，几乎没有时间娱乐.
话题75-压力.english: We live in a fast-paced society and hardly have any time to relax.

话题75-压力.chinese: 员工应该知道如何保持工作和娱乐的平衡.
话题75-压力.english: Employees are supposed to know how to keep balance between work and relaxation.

话题75-压力.chinese: 放弃那种必须以某种方式做某件事情的观点.
话题75-压力.english: Let go of the notion that you must do something in a certain way.

话题75-压力.chinese: 把庞大的项目分成小而可行的部分.
话题75-压力.english: Break large projects into smaller and doable parts.

话题75-压力.chinese: 对我来说，数数是帮助入睡的好办法.
话题75-压力.english: To me, counting numbers is a positive way to fall sleep.

话题75-压力.chinese: 在床上的时候，就要把工作中的烦恼和困难放在一边.
话题75-压力.english: Forget about your trouble and difficulties at work when you are in bed.

话题75-压力.chinese: 如果你是一个工作者，别放弃和家人度假的计划.
话题75-压力.english: If you are a workingman, don't pass up your family vacation.

话题75-压力.chinese: 现在大家都觉得时间有点儿紧迫.
话题75-压力.english: Everyone is kind of pressed for time now.

话题75-压力.chinese: 有时候参加一些活动可以让你忘记你的烦恼.
话题75-压力.english: Sometimes getting involved in an activity can take your mind off your problems.

话题75-压力.chinese: 当我们有麻烦的时候，向一个好朋友倾诉是很受益的.
话题75-压力.english: It's beneficial to articulate our feelings to a good friend when we are in trouble.
